agent_memory.message:
<code_agent_thoughts>
Now let's update the JavaScript file to implement the tab switching functionality, update the API testing interface, and implement the interactive fleet map rendering.
</code_agent_thoughts>
<code_agent_write_file file_path="static/js/main.js">
let vehicles = [
    { id: 1, x: 100, y: 150, status: 'active' },
    { id: 2, x: 300, y: 200, status: 'maintenance' },
    { id: 3, x: 200, y: 300, status: 'inactive' },
    { id: 4, x: 400, y: 100, status: 'active' },
];

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
    // Initialize Lucide icons
    lucide.createIcons();

    // Set up navigation
    setupNavigation();

    // Set up API testing interface
    setupAPITesting();

    // Render fleet map
    renderFleetMap();
});

function setupNavigation() {
    const navButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-button');
    const tabContents = document.querySelectorAll('.tab-content');

    navButtons.forEach(button => {
        button.addEventListener('click', () => {
            const tabName = button.getAttribute('data-tab');

            // Remove active class from all buttons and tab contents
            navButtons.forEach(btn => btn.classList.remove('active'));
            tabContents.forEach(content => content.classList.remove('active'));

            // Add active class to clicked button and corresponding tab content
            button.classList.add('active');
            document.getElementById(tabName).classList.add('active');
        });
    });
}

function setupAPITesting() {
    const endpointSelect = document.getElementById('endpoint-select');
    const requestBody = document.getElementById('request-body');
    const testButton = document.getElementById('test-endpoint');
    const responseArea = document.getElementById('response-area');

    testButton.addEventListener('click', () => {
        const endpoint = endpointSelect.value;
        const body = requestBody.value;

        if (!endpoint) {
            responseArea.value = 'Please select an endpoint';
            return;
        }

        // Map endpoint to actual API route
        const apiRoutes = {
            'get-vehicles': '/fleet/vehicles',
            'create-task': '/fleet/task',
            'update-vehicle': '/fleet/vehicles/1', // Assuming ID 1 for example
            'get-stats': '/reports/usage'
        };

        const method = endpoint.startsWith('get') ? 'GET' : 'POST';
        sendRequest(apiRoutes[endpoint], method, body ? JSON.parse(body) : null);
    });
}

function sendRequest(endpoint, method, body = null) {
    const options = {
        method: method,
        headers: {
            'Content-Type': 'application/json'
        }
    };

    if (body) {
        options.body = JSON.stringify(body);
    }

    fetch(endpoint, options)
        .then(response => {
            if (!response.ok) {
                throw new Error(`HTTP error! status: ${response.status}`);
            }
            return response.json();
        })
        .then(data => {
            document.getElementById('response-area').value = JSON.stringify(data, null, 2);
        })
        .catch(error => {
            console.error('Error:', error);
            document.getElementById('response-area').value = `Error: ${error.message}`;
        });
}

function renderFleetMap() {
    const mapContainer = document.getElementById('fleet-map');
    const svg = document.createElementNS("http://www.w3.org/2000/svg", "svg");
    svg.setAttribute('width', '100%');
    svg.setAttribute('height', '100%');
    svg.setAttribute('viewBox', '0 0 1000 800');

    // Background
    const background = document.createElementNS("http://www.w3.org/2000/svg", "rect");
    background.setAttribute('width', '1000');
    background.setAttribute('height', '800');
    background.setAttribute('fill', '#e6e8e6');
    svg.appendChild(background);

    // Water bodies
    const water = document.createElementNS("http://www.w3.org/2000/svg", "path");
    water.setAttribute('d', 'M0 600 Q 250 550, 500 600 T 1000 600 V 800 H 0 Z');
    water.setAttribute('fill', '#a5d5f5');
    svg.appendChild(water);

    // Roads
    const roads = document.createElementNS("http://www.w3.org/2000/svg", "g");
    roads.innerHTML = `
        <g stroke="#ffffff" stroke-width="20">
            <line x1="0" y1="200" x2="1000" y2="200" />
            <line x1="0" y1="400" x2="1000" y2="400" />
            <line x1="0" y1="600" x2="1000" y2="600" />
            <line x1="200" y1="0" x2="200" y2="800" />
            <line x1="500" y1="0" x2="500" y2="800" />
            <line x1="800" y1="0" x2="800" y2="800" />
        </g>
        <g stroke="#ffffff" stroke-width="10" stroke-dasharray="20,20">
            <line x1="0" y1="100" x2="1000" y2="100" />
            <line x1="0" y1="300" x2="1000" y2="300" />
            <line x1="0" y1="500" x2="1000" y2="500" />
            <line x1="0" y1="700" x2="1000" y2="700" />
            <line x1="100" y1="0" x2="100" y2="800" />
            <line x1="300" y1="0" x2="300" y2="800" />
            <line x1="400" y1="0" x2="400" y2="800" />
            <line x1="600" y1="0" x2="600" y2="800" />
            <line x1="700" y1="0" x2="700" y2="800" />
            <line x1="900" y1="0" x2="900" y2="800" />
        </g>
    `;
    svg.appendChild(roads);

    // Buildings
    const buildings = document.createElementNS("http://www.w3.org/2000/svg", "g");
    buildings.innerHTML = `
        <g fill="#d1d5db">
            <rect x="20" y="20" width="160" height="160" />
            <rect x="220" y="20" width="100" height="80" />
            <rect x="520" y="20" width="140" height="120" />
            <rect x="820" y="20" width="160" height="160" />
            <rect x="20" y="420" width="120" height="120" />
            <rect x="220" y="420" width="180" height="80" />
            <rect x="520" y="420" width="100" height="100" />
            <rect x="820" y="420" width="140" height="140" />
        </g>
    `;
    svg.appendChild(buildings);

    // Parks
    const parks = document.createElementNS("http://www.w3.org/2000/svg", "g");
    parks.innerHTML = `
        <g fill="#86efac">
            <circle cx="400" cy="300" r="80" />
            <circle cx="700" cy="500" r="60" />
            <rect x="50" y="220" width="100" height="160" rx="20" />
        </g>
    `;
    svg.appendChild(parks);

    // Vehicles
    const vehiclesGroup = document.createElementNS("http://www.w3.org/2000/svg", "g");
    vehicles.forEach(vehicle => {
        const vehicleGroup = document.createElementNS("http://www.w3.org/2000/svg", "g");
        const circle = document.createElementNS("http://www.w3.org/2000/svg", "circle");
        circle.setAttribute('cx', vehicle.x * 2);
        circle.setAttribute('cy', vehicle.y * 2);
        circle.setAttribute('r', '12');
        circle.setAttribute('fill', getVehicleColor(vehicle.status));
        circle.setAttribute('stroke', '#ffffff');
        circle.setAttribute('stroke-width', '2');
        vehicleGroup.appendChild(circle);

        const text = document.createElementNS("http://www.w3.org/2000/svg", "text");
        text.setAttribute('x', vehicle.x * 2);
        text.setAttribute('y', vehicle.y * 2 + 4);
        text.setAttribute('text-anchor', 'middle');
        text.setAttribute('fill', '#ffffff');
        text.setAttribute('font-size', '10');
        text.setAttribute('font-weight', 'bold');
        text.textContent = vehicle.id;
        vehicleGroup.appendChild(text);

        vehiclesGroup.appendChild(vehicleGroup);
    });
    svg.appendChild(vehiclesGroup);

    mapContainer.appendChild(svg);
}

function getVehicleColor(status) {
    switch (status) {
        case 'active': return '#22c55e';
        case 'maintenance': return '#eab308';
        case 'inactive': return '#ef4444';
        default: return '#3b82f6';
    }
}
</code_agent_write_file>

// ... (previous code remains unchanged)

function renderFleetMap() {
    // ... (previous code remains unchanged)

    // Vehicles
    const vehiclesGroup = document.createElementNS("http://www.w3.org/2000/svg", "g");
    vehicles.forEach(vehicle => {
        const vehicleGroup = document.createElementNS("http://www.w3.org/2000/svg", "g");
        const circle = document.createElementNS("http://www.w3.org/2000/svg", "circle");
        circle.setAttribute('cx', vehicle.x * 2);
        circle.setAttribute('cy', vehicle.y * 2);
        circle.setAttribute('r', '12');
        circle.setAttribute('fill', getVehicleColor(vehicle.status));
        circle.setAttribute('stroke', '#ffffff');
        circle.setAttribute('stroke-width', '2');
        vehicleGroup.appendChild(circle);

        const text = document.createElementNS("http://www.w3.org/2000/svg", "text");
        text.setAttribute('x', vehicle.x * 2);
        text.setAttribute('y', vehicle.y * 2 + 4);
        text.setAttribute('text-anchor', 'middle');
        text.setAttribute('fill', '#ffffff');
        text.setAttribute('font-size', '10');
        text.setAttribute('font-weight', 'bold');
        text.textContent = vehicle.id;
        vehicleGroup.appendChild(text);

        vehicleGroup.addEventListener('click', () => showVehicleDetails(vehicle));

        // Make vehicle draggable
        makeDraggable(vehicleGroup, vehicle);

        vehiclesGroup.appendChild(vehicleGroup);
    });
    svg.appendChild(vehiclesGroup);

    // ... (rest of the function remains unchanged)
}

function makeDraggable(element, vehicle) {
    let isDragging = false;
    let startX, startY;

    element.addEventListener('mousedown', startDrag);
    element.addEventListener('mousemove', drag);
    element.addEventListener('mouseup', endDrag);
    element.addEventListener('mouseleave', endDrag);

    function startDrag(e) {
        isDragging = true;
        startX = e.clientX - vehicle.x * 2;
        startY = e.clientY - vehicle.y * 2;
        element.setAttribute('cursor', 'grabbing');
    }

    function drag(e) {
        if (!isDragging) return;
        e.preventDefault();
        const newX = (e.clientX - startX) / 2;
        const newY = (e.clientY - startY) / 2;
        vehicle.x = Math.max(0, Math.min(500, newX));
        vehicle.y = Math.max(0, Math.min(400, newY));
        element.querySelector('circle').setAttribute('cx', vehicle.x * 2);
        element.querySelector('circle').setAttribute('cy', vehicle.y * 2);
        element.querySelector('text').setAttribute('x', vehicle.x * 2);
        element.querySelector('text').setAttribute('y', vehicle.y * 2 + 4);
    }

    function endDrag() {
        isDragging = false;
        element.setAttribute('cursor', 'grab');
    }
}

// ... (rest of the file remains unchanged)
</code_agent_write_file>

function setupVehicleSearch() {
    const searchInput = document.getElementById('vehicle-search');
    searchInput.addEventListener('input', () => {
        const searchTerm = searchInput.value.trim();
        highlightSearchedVehicle(searchTerm);
    });
}

function highlightSearchedVehicle(searchTerm) {
    const vehicleElements = document.querySelectorAll('#fleet-map g g');
    vehicleElements.forEach(element => {
        const vehicleId = element.querySelector('text').textContent;
        if (vehicleId === searchTerm) {
            element.querySelector('circle').setAttribute('stroke', '#ff0000');
            element.querySelector('circle').setAttribute('stroke-width', '4');
        } else {
            element.querySelector('circle').setAttribute('stroke', '#ffffff');
            element.querySelector('circle').setAttribute('stroke-width', '2');
        }
    });
}

<code_agent_write_file file_path="static/js/main.js">
// ... (previous code remains unchanged)

function setupRealTimeUpdates() {
    const statusUpdates = document.getElementById('status-updates');

    // Simulating WebSocket connection
    setInterval(() => {
        const randomVehicle = vehicles[Math.floor(Math.random() * vehicles.length)];
        const newStatus = ['active', 'maintenance', 'inactive'][Math.floor(Math.random() * 3)];
        
        if (randomVehicle.status !== newStatus) {
            randomVehicle.status = newStatus;
            const updateItem = document.createElement('li');
            updateItem.textContent = `Vehicle ${randomVehicle.id} changed status to ${newStatus}`;
            updateItem.classList.add('fade-in');
            statusUpdates.prepend(updateItem);

            // Limit the number of displayed updates
            if (statusUpdates.children.length > 5) {
                statusUpdates.removeChild(statusUpdates.lastChild);
            }

            // Show notification
            showNotification(`Vehicle ${randomVehicle.id} is now ${newStatus}`);

            // Update the map
            renderFleetMap();
        }
    }, 5000);
}

function showNotification(message) {
    const notificationArea = document.getElementById('notification-area');
    const notification = document.createElement('div');
    notification.classList.add('notification');
    notification.textContent = message;
    notificationArea.appendChild(notification);

    // Fade in
    setTimeout(() => {
        notification.style.opacity = '1';
    }, 100);

    // Remove after 5 seconds
    setTimeout(() => {
        notification.style.opacity = '0';
        setTimeout(() => {
            notificationArea.removeChild(notification);
        }, 500);
    }, 5000);
}

// ... (rest of the file remains unchanged)
</code_agent_write_file>

// ... (previous code remains unchanged)

function initializeCharts() {
    // Vehicle Status Distribution Chart
    const statusCtx = document.getElementById('vehicleStatusChart').getContext('2d');
    new Chart(statusCtx, {
        type: 'pie',
        data: {
            labels: ['Active', 'Maintenance', 'Inactive'],
            datasets: [{
                data: [70, 20, 10],
                backgroundColor: ['#22c55e', '#eab308', '#ef4444']
            }]
        },
        options: {
            responsive: true,
            plugins: {
                legend: {
                    position: 'bottom',
                },
                tooltip: {
                    callbacks: {
                        label: function(context) {
                            const label = context.label || '';
                            const value = context.parsed || 0;
                            const total = context.dataset.data.reduce((acc, data) => acc + data, 0);
                            const percentage = ((value / total) * 100).toFixed(2) + '%';
                            return `${label}: ${percentage}`;
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    });

    // Maintenance Tasks Over Time Chart
    const maintenanceCtx = document.getElementById('maintenanceTasksChart').getContext('2d');
    new Chart(maintenanceCtx, {
        type: 'line',
        data: {
            labels: ['Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'Apr', 'May', 'Jun'],
            datasets: [{
                label: 'Maintenance Tasks',
                data: [12, 19, 3, 5, 2, 3],
                borderColor: '#3b82f6',
                tension: 0.1,
                fill: false
            }]
        },
        options: {
            responsive: true,
            scales: {
                y: {
                    beginAtZero: true
                }
            },
            interaction: {
                intersect: false,
                mode: 'index'
            },
            plugins: {
                tooltip: {
                    callbacks: {
                        label: function(context) {
                            return `Tasks: ${context.parsed.y}`;
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    });

    // Vehicle Utilization Rate Chart
    const utilizationCtx = document.getElementById('vehicleUtilizationChart').getContext('2d');
    new Chart(utilizationCtx, {
        type: 'bar',
        data: {
            labels: ['Vehicle 1', 'Vehicle 2', 'Vehicle 3', 'Vehicle 4'],
            datasets: [{
                label: 'Utilization Rate (%)',
                data: [85, 72, 90, 68],
                backgroundColor: '#3b82f6'
            }]
        },
        options: {
            responsive: true,
            scales: {
                y: {
                    beginAtZero: true,
                    max: 100
                }
            },
            plugins: {
                tooltip: {
                    callbacks: {
                        label: function(context) {
                            return `Utilization: ${context.parsed.y}%`;
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    });
}

// ... (rest of the file remains unchanged)
</code_agent_write_file>

// ... (previous code remains unchanged)

let vehicles = [
    { id: 1, x: 100, y: 150, status: 'active' },
    { id: 2, x: 300, y: 200, status: 'maintenance' },
    { id: 3, x: 200, y: 300, status: 'inactive' },
    { id: 4, x: 400, y: 100, status: 'active' },
];

function renderFleetMap() {
    const mapContainer = document.getElementById('fleet-map');
    mapContainer.innerHTML = ''; // Clear previous content

    const svg = document.createElementNS('http://www.w3.org/2000/svg', 'svg');
    svg.setAttribute('width', '100%');
    svg.setAttribute('height', '100%');
    svg.setAttribute('viewBox', '0 0 1000 800');

    // Add background
    const background = document.createElementNS('http://www.w3.org/2000/svg', 'rect');
    background.setAttribute('width', '1000');
    background.setAttribute('height', '800');
    background.setAttribute('fill', '#e6e8e6');
    svg.appendChild(background);

    // Add vehicles
    vehicles.forEach(vehicle => {
        const vehicleGroup = document.createElementNS('http://www.w3.org/2000/svg', 'g');
        vehicleGroup.setAttribute('id', `vehicle-${vehicle.id}`);
        vehicleGroup.setAttribute('transform', `translate(${vehicle.x}, ${vehicle.y})`);

        const circle = document.createElementNS('http://www.w3.org/2000/svg', 'circle');
        circle.setAttribute('r', '12');
        circle.setAttribute('fill', getVehicleColor(vehicle.status));
        circle.setAttribute('stroke', '#ffffff');
        circle.setAttribute('stroke-width', '2');

        const text = document.createElementNS('http://www.w3.org/2000/svg', 'text');
        text.setAttribute('text-anchor', 'middle');
        text.setAttribute('dy', '4');
        text.setAttribute('fill', '#ffffff');
        text.setAttribute('font-size', '10');
        text.setAttribute('font-weight', 'bold');
        text.textContent = vehicle.id;

        vehicleGroup.appendChild(circle);
        vehicleGroup.appendChild(text);

        // Add drag functionality
        vehicleGroup.addEventListener('mousedown', startDragging);
        svg.appendChild(vehicleGroup);
    });

    mapContainer.appendChild(svg);
}

function getVehicleColor(status) {
    switch (status) {
        case 'active': return '#22c55e';
        case 'maintenance': return '#eab308';
        case 'inactive': return '#ef4444';
        default: return '#3b82f6';
    }
}

function startDragging(e) {
    const vehicleGroup = e.target.closest('g');
    const vehicleId = parseInt(vehicleGroup.id.split('-')[1]);
    const vehicle = vehicles.find(v => v.id === vehicleId);

    function drag(e) {
        const svg = vehicleGroup.closest('svg');
        const pt = svg.createSVGPoint();
        pt.x = e.clientX;
        pt.y = e.clientY;
        const svgP = pt.matrixTransform(svg.getScreenCTM().inverse());

        vehicle.x = svgP.x;
        vehicle.y = svgP.y;
        vehicleGroup.setAttribute('transform', `translate(${vehicle.x}, ${vehicle.y})`);
    }

    function stopDragging() {
        document.removeEventListener('mousemove', drag);
        document.removeEventListener('mouseup', stopDragging);
    }

    document.addEventListener('mousemove', drag);
    document.addEventListener('mouseup', stopDragging);
}

function setupRealTimeUpdates() {
    const statusUpdates = document.getElementById('status-updates');

    // Simulating WebSocket connection
    setInterval(() => {
        const randomVehicle = vehicles[Math.floor(Math.random() * vehicles.length)];
        const newStatus = ['active', 'maintenance', 'inactive'][Math.floor(Math.random() * 3)];
        
        if (randomVehicle.status !== newStatus) {
            randomVehicle.status = newStatus;
            const updateItem = document.createElement('li');
            updateItem.textContent = `Vehicle ${randomVehicle.id} changed status to ${newStatus}`;
            updateItem.classList.add('fade-in');
            statusUpdates.prepend(updateItem);

            // Limit the number of displayed updates
            if (statusUpdates.children.length > 5) {
                statusUpdates.removeChild(statusUpdates.lastChild);
            }

            // Show notification
            showNotification(`Vehicle ${randomVehicle.id} is now ${newStatus}`);

            // Update the map
            renderFleetMap();
        }
    }, 5000);
}

function showNotification(message) {
    const notificationArea = document.getElementById('notification-area');
    const notification = document.createElement('div');
    notification.classList.add('notification');
    notification.textContent = message;
    notificationArea.appendChild(notification);

    // Fade in
    setTimeout(() => {
        notification.style.opacity = '1';
    }, 100);

    // Remove after 5 seconds
    setTimeout(() => {
        notification.style.opacity = '0';
        setTimeout(() => {
            notificationArea.removeChild(notification);
        }, 500);
    }, 5000);
}

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
    renderFleetMap();
    setupRealTimeUpdates();
    initializeCharts();
});

from flask import Flask, render_template, jsonify
from flask_migrate import Migrate
from extensions import db
from api import fleet, maintenance, rebalancing, user, reporting, integration, future_modules
import os
import logging

def create_app():
    app = Flask(__name__, static_folder='static', template_folder='templates')

    # Configure logging
    logging.basicConfig(filename='app.log', level=logging.DEBUG)
    logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)

    # Database configuration
    app.config['SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI'] = os.environ.get('DATABASE_URL')
    app.config['SQLALCHEMY_TRACK_MODIFICATIONS'] = False
    
    db.init_app(app)
    migrate = Migrate(app, db)

    # Register blueprints
    app.register_blueprint(fleet.bp)
    app.register_blueprint(maintenance.bp)
    app.register_blueprint(rebalancing.bp)
    app.register_blueprint(user.bp)
    app.register_blueprint(reporting.bp)
    app.register_blueprint(integration.bp)
    app.register_blueprint(future_modules.bp)

    @app.route('/')
    def index():
        app.logger.debug(f"Rendering template: {app.template_folder}/index.html")
        return render_template('index.html')

    @app.errorhandler(404)
    def not_found(error):
        logger.error(f"404 error: {error}")
        return jsonify({"error": "Not found"}), 404

    @app.errorhandler(500)
    def server_error(error):
        logger.error(f"500 error: {error}")
        return jsonify({"error": "Internal server error"}), 500

    @app.errorhandler(Exception)
    def handle_exception(e):
        logger.error(f"Unhandled exception: {str(e)}")
        return jsonify({"error": "An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later or contact support."}), 500

    return app

if __name__ == '__main__':
    app = create_app()
    app.run(host='0.0.0.0', port=5000, debug=True)
</code_agent_write_file>

from flask import Flask, render_template, jsonify
from flask_migrate import Migrate
from extensions import db
from api import fleet, maintenance, rebalancing, user, reporting, integration, future_modules
import os
import logging

def create_app():
    app = Flask(__name__, static_folder='static', template_folder='templates')

    # Configure logging
    logging.basicConfig(filename='app.log', level=logging.DEBUG)
    logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)

    # Database configuration
    app.config['SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI'] = os.environ.get('DATABASE_URL')
    app.config['SQLALCHEMY_TRACK_MODIFICATIONS'] = False
    
    db.init_app(app)
    migrate = Migrate(app, db)

    # Register blueprints
    app.register_blueprint(fleet.bp)
    app.register_blueprint(maintenance.bp)
    app.register_blueprint(rebalancing.bp)
    app.register_blueprint(user.bp)
    app.register_blueprint(reporting.bp)
    app.register_blueprint(integration.bp)
    app.register_blueprint(future_modules.bp)

    @app.route('/')
    def index():
        app.logger.debug(f"Rendering template: {app.template_folder}/index.html")
        return render_template('index.html')

    @app.errorhandler(404)
    def not_found(error):
        logger.error(f"404 error: {error}")
        return jsonify({"error": "Not found"}), 404

    @app.errorhandler(500)
    def server_error(error):
        logger.error(f"500 error: {error}")
        return jsonify({"error": "Internal server error"}), 500

    @app.errorhandler(Exception)
    def handle_exception(e):
        logger.error(f"Unhandled exception: {str(e)}")
        return jsonify({"error": "An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later or contact support."}), 500

    return app

if __name__ == '__main__':
    app = create_app()
    app.run(host='0.0.0.0', port=5000, debug=True)

<code_agent_thoughts>
To enhance the user interface with more interactive features and visualizations, we'll start by improving the interactive fleet map. We'll add zoom and pan functionality, make vehicle markers draggable, and add tooltips for vehicle details. Let's update the main.js file to implement these features.
</code_agent_thoughts>
<code_agent_write_file file_path="static/js/main.js">
// Global variables
let map;
let vehicles = [
    { id: 1, x: 100, y: 150, status: 'active' },
    { id: 2, x: 300, y: 200, status: 'maintenance' },
    { id: 3, x: 200, y: 300, status: 'inactive' },
    { id: 4, x: 400, y: 100, status: 'active' },
];

function initializeMap() {
    const mapContainer = document.getElementById('fleet-map');
    const svg = document.createElementNS('http://www.w3.org/2000/svg', 'svg');
    svg.setAttribute('width', '100%');
    svg.setAttribute('height', '100%');
    svg.setAttribute('viewBox', '0 0 1000 800');

    // Add background
    const background = document.createElementNS('http://www.w3.org/2000/svg', 'rect');
    background.setAttribute('width', '1000');
    background.setAttribute('height', '800');
    background.setAttribute('fill', '#e6e8e6');
    svg.appendChild(background);

    // Add zoom and pan functionality
    const g = document.createElementNS('http://www.w3.org/2000/svg', 'g');
    svg.appendChild(g);

    let isPanning = false;
    let startPoint = { x: 0, y: 0 };
    let endPoint = { x: 0, y: 0 };
    let scale = 1;

    svg.addEventListener('mousewheel', (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        scale += e.deltaY * -0.001;
        scale = Math.min(Math.max(0.1, scale), 4);
        g.setAttribute('transform', `scale(${scale})`);
    });

    svg.addEventListener('mousedown', (e) => {
        isPanning = true;
        startPoint = { x: e.clientX, y: e.clientY };
    });

    svg.addEventListener('mousemove', (e) => {
        if (isPanning) {
            endPoint = { x: e.clientX, y: e.clientY };
            const dx = (endPoint.x - startPoint.x) / scale;
            const dy = (endPoint.y - startPoint.y) / scale;
            g.setAttribute('transform', `translate(${dx}, ${dy}) scale(${scale})`);
        }
    });

    svg.addEventListener('mouseup', () => {
        isPanning = false;
    });

    mapContainer.appendChild(svg);
    map = g;
    renderVehicles();
}

function renderVehicles() {
    map.innerHTML = '';
    vehicles.forEach(vehicle => {
        const vehicleGroup = document.createElementNS('http://www.w3.org/2000/svg', 'g');
        vehicleGroup.setAttribute('id', `vehicle-${vehicle.id}`);
        vehicleGroup.setAttribute('transform', `translate(${vehicle.x}, ${vehicle.y})`);

        const circle = document.createElementNS('http://www.w3.org/2000/svg', 'circle');
        circle.setAttribute('r', '12');
        circle.setAttribute('fill', getVehicleColor(vehicle.status));
        circle.setAttribute('stroke', '#ffffff');
        circle.setAttribute('stroke-width', '2');

        const text = document.createElementNS('http://www.w3.org/2000/svg', 'text');
        text.setAttribute('text-anchor', 'middle');
        text.setAttribute('dy', '4');
        text.setAttribute('fill', '#ffffff');
        text.setAttribute('font-size', '10');
        text.setAttribute('font-weight', 'bold');
        text.textContent = vehicle.id;

        vehicleGroup.appendChild(circle);
        vehicleGroup.appendChild(text);

        // Add drag functionality
        vehicleGroup.addEventListener('mousedown', startDragging);

        // Add tooltip
        vehicleGroup.addEventListener('mouseover', showTooltip);
        vehicleGroup.addEventListener('mouseout', hideTooltip);

        map.appendChild(vehicleGroup);
    });
}

function getVehicleColor(status) {
    switch (status) {
        case 'active': return '#22c55e';
        case 'maintenance': return '#eab308';
        case 'inactive': return '#ef4444';
        default: return '#3b82f6';
    }
}

function startDragging(e) {
    const vehicleGroup = e.target.closest('g');
    const vehicleId = parseInt(vehicleGroup.id.split('-')[1]);
    const vehicle = vehicles.find(v => v.id === vehicleId);

    function drag(e) {
        const pt = map.ownerSVGElement.createSVGPoint();
        pt.x = e.clientX;
        pt.y = e.clientY;
        const svgP = pt.matrixTransform(map.getScreenCTM().inverse());

        vehicle.x = svgP.x;
        vehicle.y = svgP.y;
        vehicleGroup.setAttribute('transform', `translate(${vehicle.x}, ${vehicle.y})`);
    }

    function stopDragging() {
        document.removeEventListener('mousemove', drag);
        document.removeEventListener('mouseup', stopDragging);
    }

    document.addEventListener('mousemove', drag);
    document.addEventListener('mouseup', stopDragging);
}

function showTooltip(e) {
    const vehicleGroup = e.target.closest('g');
    const vehicleId = parseInt(vehicleGroup.id.split('-')[1]);
    const vehicle = vehicles.find(v => v.id === vehicleId);

    const tooltip = document.createElementNS('http://www.w3.org/2000/svg', 'g');
    tooltip.setAttribute('id', 'tooltip');

    const rect = document.createElementNS('http://www.w3.org/2000/svg', 'rect');
    rect.setAttribute('x', '-60');
    rect.setAttribute('y', '-50');
    rect.setAttribute('width', '120');
    rect.setAttribute('height', '40');
    rect.setAttribute('fill', 'white');
    rect.setAttribute('stroke', 'black');

    const text = document.createElementNS('http://www.w3.org/2000/svg', 'text');
    text.setAttribute('x', '0');
    text.setAttribute('y', '-25');
    text.setAttribute('text-anchor', 'middle');
    text.setAttribute('fill', 'black');
    text.textContent = `Vehicle ${vehicle.id}: ${vehicle.status}`;

    tooltip.appendChild(rect);
    tooltip.appendChild(text);
    vehicleGroup.appendChild(tooltip);
}

function hideTooltip() {
    const tooltip = document.getElementById('tooltip');
    if (tooltip) {
        tooltip.remove();
    }
}

function setupRealTimeUpdates() {
    const statusUpdates = document.getElementById('status-updates');

    // Simulating WebSocket connection
    setInterval(() => {
        const randomVehicle = vehicles[Math.floor(Math.random() * vehicles.length)];
        const newStatus = ['active', 'maintenance', 'inactive'][Math.floor(Math.random() * 3)];
        
        if (randomVehicle.status !== newStatus) {
            randomVehicle.status = newStatus;
            const updateItem = document.createElement('li');
            updateItem.textContent = `Vehicle ${randomVehicle.id} changed status to ${newStatus}`;
            updateItem.classList.add('fade-in');
            statusUpdates.prepend(updateItem);

            // Limit the number of displayed updates
            if (statusUpdates.children.length > 5) {
                statusUpdates.removeChild(statusUpdates.lastChild);
            }

            // Show notification
            showNotification(`Vehicle ${randomVehicle.id} is now ${newStatus}`);

            // Update the map
            renderVehicles();
        }
    }, 5000);
}

function showNotification(message) {
    const notificationArea = document.getElementById('notification-area');
    const notification = document.createElement('div');
    notification.classList.add('notification');
    notification.textContent = message;
    notificationArea.appendChild(notification);

    // Fade in
    setTimeout(() => {
        notification.style.opacity = '1';
    }, 100);

    // Remove after 5 seconds
    setTimeout(() => {
        notification.style.opacity = '0';
        setTimeout(() => {
            notificationArea.removeChild(notification);
        }, 500);
    }, 5000);
}

function initializeCharts() {
    // Vehicle Status Distribution Chart
    const statusCtx = document.getElementById('vehicleStatusChart').getContext('2d');
    new Chart(statusCtx, {
        type: 'pie',
        data: {
            labels: ['Active', 'Maintenance', 'Inactive'],
            datasets: [{
                data: [2, 1, 1], // Initial data
                backgroundColor: ['#22c55e', '#eab308', '#ef4444']
            }]
        },
        options: {
            responsive: true,
            title: {
                display: true,
                text: 'Vehicle Status Distribution'
            }
        }
    });

    // Maintenance Tasks Over Time Chart
    const maintenanceCtx = document.getElementById('maintenanceTasksChart').getContext('2d');
    new Chart(maintenanceCtx, {
        type: 'line',
        data: {
            labels: ['Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'Apr', 'May', 'Jun'],
            datasets: [{
                label: 'Maintenance Tasks',
                data: [12, 19, 3, 5, 2, 3],
                borderColor: '#3b82f6',
                fill: false
            }]
        },
        options: {
            responsive: true,
            title: {
                display: true,
                text: 'Maintenance Tasks Over Time'
            },
            scales: {
                yAxes: [{
                    ticks: {
                        beginAtZero: true
                    }
                }]
            }
        }
    });

    // Vehicle Utilization Rate Chart
    const utilizationCtx = document.getElementById('vehicleUtilizationChart').getContext('2d');
    new Chart(utilizationCtx, {
        type: 'bar',
        data: {
            labels: ['Vehicle 1', 'Vehicle 2', 'Vehicle 3', 'Vehicle 4'],
            datasets: [{
                label: 'Utilization Rate (%)',
                data: [75, 62, 80, 55],
                backgroundColor: '#4ade80'
            }]
        },
        options: {
            responsive: true,
            title: {
                display: true,
                text: 'Vehicle Utilization Rate'
            },
            scales: {
                yAxes: [{
                    ticks: {
                        beginAtZero: true,
                        max: 100
                    }
                }]
            }
        }
    });
}

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
    initializeMap();
    setupRealTimeUpdates();
    initializeCharts();
});
</code_agent_write_file>

body {
    font-family: Arial, sans-serif;

}

.container {
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 1rem;
}

h1 {
    text-align: center;
    color: #1f2937;
}

.dashboard-grid {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
    gap: 1.5rem;
    margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
}

.card {
    background-color: #ffffff;
    border-radius: 0.5rem;
    box-shadow: 0 1px 3px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 1px 2px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06);
    overflow: hidden;
    margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
}

.card-header {
    padding: 1rem;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
    background-color: #f9fafb;
}

.card-header h2 {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: 1.25rem;
    color: #111827;
}

.card-content {
    padding: 1rem;
}

#fleet-map {
    width: 100%;
    height: 400px;
    background-color: #e5e7eb;
    border-radius: 0.25rem;
}

#status-updates {
    list-style-type: none;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0;
    max-height: 200px;
    overflow-y: auto;
}

#status-updates li {
    padding: 0.5rem;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
}

#notification-area {
    position: fixed;
    top: 20px;
    right: 20px;
    z-index: 1000;
}

.notification {
    background-color: #4CAF50;
    color: white;
    padding: 15px;
    margin-bottom: 15px;
    border-radius: 5px;
    opacity: 0;
    transition: opacity 0.5s;
}

.api-testing-container {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    gap: 1rem;
}

.endpoint-selection {
    display: flex;
    gap: 1rem;
}

#endpoint-search, #endpoint-select {
    flex: 1;
    padding: 0.5rem;
    border: 1px solid #d1d5db;
    border-radius: 0.25rem;
}

.request-response-container {
    display: flex;
    gap: 1rem;
}

.request-container, .response-container {
    flex: 1;
}

pre {
    background-color: #f3f4f6;
    padding: 1rem;
    border-radius: 0.25rem;
    overflow-x: auto;
}

button {
    background-color: #3b82f6;
    color: #ffffff;
    border: none;
    padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
    border-radius: 0.25rem;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: background-color 0.3s;
}

button:hover {
    background-color: #2563eb;
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
    .dashboard-grid {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    }

    .request-response-container {
        flex-direction: column;
    }
}

.fade-in {
    animation: fadeIn 0.5s;
}

@keyframes fadeIn {
    from { opacity: 0; }
    to { opacity: 1; }
}
</code_agent_write_file>

agent_memory.message:
<code_agent_thoughts>
Thank you for the detailed instructions. I'll start by refining and testing the interactive features and visualizations as requested. Let's begin with verifying and improving the Interactive Fleet Map functionality.
</code_agent_thoughts>
<code_agent_write_file file_path="static/js/main.js">
// Global variables
let map;
let vehicles = [
    { id: 1, x: 100, y: 150, status: 'active' },
    { id: 2, x: 300, y: 200, status: 'maintenance' },
    { id: 3, x: 200, y: 300, status: 'inactive' },
    { id: 4, x: 400, y: 100, status: 'active' },
];

function initializeMap() {
    const mapContainer = document.getElementById('fleet-map');
    const svg = document.createElementNS('http://www.w3.org/2000/svg', 'svg');
    svg.setAttribute('width', '100%');
    svg.setAttribute('height', '100%');
    svg.setAttribute('viewBox', '0 0 1000 800');

    // Add background
    const background = document.createElementNS('http://www.w3.org/2000/svg', 'rect');
    background.setAttribute('width', '1000');
    background.setAttribute('height', '800');
    background.setAttribute('fill', '#e6e8e6');
    svg.appendChild(background);

    // Add zoom and pan functionality
    const g = document.createElementNS('http://www.w3.org/2000/svg', 'g');
    svg.appendChild(g);

    let isPanning = false;
    let startPoint = { x: 0, y: 0 };
    let endPoint = { x: 0, y: 0 };
    let scale = 1;
    let translateX = 0;
    let translateY = 0;

    svg.addEventListener('wheel', (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        const delta = e.deltaY > 0 ? 0.9 : 1.1;
        scale *= delta;
        scale = Math.min(Math.max(0.5, scale), 4);
        const mouseX = e.clientX - mapContainer.getBoundingClientRect().left;
        const mouseY = e.clientY - mapContainer.getBoundingClientRect().top;
        translateX += (mouseX - translateX) * (1 - delta);
        translateY += (mouseY - translateY) * (1 - delta);
        updateMapTransform();
    });

    svg.addEventListener('mousedown', (e) => {
        isPanning = true;
        startPoint = { x: e.clientX, y: e.clientY };
    });

    svg.addEventListener('mousemove', (e) => {
        if (isPanning) {
            endPoint = { x: e.clientX, y: e.clientY };
            translateX += (endPoint.x - startPoint.x) / scale;
            translateY += (endPoint.y - startPoint.y) / scale;
            startPoint = endPoint;
            updateMapTransform();
        }
    });

    svg.addEventListener('mouseup', () => {
        isPanning = false;
    });

    svg.addEventListener('mouseleave', () => {
        isPanning = false;
    });

    function updateMapTransform() {
        g.setAttribute('transform', `translate(${translateX}, ${translateY}) scale(${scale})`);
    }

    mapContainer.appendChild(svg);
    map = g;
    renderVehicles();
}

function renderVehicles() {
    map.innerHTML = '';
    vehicles.forEach(vehicle => {
        const vehicleGroup = document.createElementNS('http://www.w3.org/2000/svg', 'g');
        vehicleGroup.setAttribute('id', `vehicle-${vehicle.id}`);
        vehicleGroup.setAttribute('transform', `translate(${vehicle.x}, ${vehicle.y})`);

        const circle = document.createElementNS('http://www.w3.org/2000/svg', 'circle');
        circle.setAttribute('r', '12');
        circle.setAttribute('fill', getVehicleColor(vehicle.status));
        circle.setAttribute('stroke', '#ffffff');
        circle.setAttribute('stroke-width', '2');

        const text = document.createElementNS('http://www.w3.org/2000/svg', 'text');
        text.setAttribute('text-anchor', 'middle');
        text.setAttribute('dy', '4');
        text.setAttribute('fill', '#ffffff');
        text.setAttribute('font-size', '10');
        text.setAttribute('font-weight', 'bold');
        text.textContent = vehicle.id;

        vehicleGroup.appendChild(circle);
        vehicleGroup.appendChild(text);

        // Add drag functionality
        vehicleGroup.addEventListener('mousedown', startDragging);

        // Add tooltip
        vehicleGroup.addEventListener('mouseover', showTooltip);
        vehicleGroup.addEventListener('mouseout', hideTooltip);

        map.appendChild(vehicleGroup);
    });
}

function getVehicleColor(status) {
    switch (status) {
        case 'active': return '#22c55e';
        case 'maintenance': return '#eab308';
        case 'inactive': return '#ef4444';
        default: return '#3b82f6';
    }
}

function startDragging(e) {
    e.stopPropagation();
    const vehicleGroup = e.target.closest('g');
    const vehicleId = parseInt(vehicleGroup.id.split('-')[1]);
    const vehicle = vehicles.find(v => v.id === vehicleId);

    let startX = e.clientX;
    let startY = e.clientY;

    function drag(e) {
        const dx = (e.clientX - startX) / scale;
        const dy = (e.clientY - startY) / scale;
        vehicle.x += dx;
        vehicle.y += dy;
        vehicleGroup.setAttribute('transform', `translate(${vehicle.x}, ${vehicle.y})`);
        startX = e.clientX;
        startY = e.clientY;
    }

    function stopDragging() {
        document.removeEventListener('mousemove', drag);
        document.removeEventListener('mouseup', stopDragging);
    }

    document.addEventListener('mousemove', drag);
    document.addEventListener('mouseup', stopDragging);
}

function showTooltip(e) {
    const vehicleGroup = e.target.closest('g');
    const vehicleId = parseInt(vehicleGroup.id.split('-')[1]);
    const vehicle = vehicles.find(v => v.id === vehicleId);

    const tooltip = document.createElementNS('http://www.w3.org/2000/svg', 'g');
    tooltip.setAttribute('id', 'tooltip');

    const rect = document.createElementNS('http://www.w3.org/2000/svg', 'rect');
    rect.setAttribute('x', '-60');
    rect.setAttribute('y', '-50');
    rect.setAttribute('width', '120');
    rect.setAttribute('height', '40');
    rect.setAttribute('fill', 'white');
    rect.setAttribute('stroke', 'black');

    const text = document.createElementNS('http://www.w3.org/2000/svg', 'text');
    text.setAttribute('x', '0');
    text.setAttribute('y', '-25');
    text.setAttribute('text-anchor', 'middle');
    text.setAttribute('fill', 'black');
    text.textContent = `Vehicle ${vehicle.id}: ${vehicle.status}`;

    tooltip.appendChild(rect);
    tooltip.appendChild(text);
    vehicleGroup.appendChild(tooltip);
}

function hideTooltip() {
    const tooltip = document.getElementById('tooltip');
    if (tooltip) {
        tooltip.remove();
    }
}

function setupRealTimeUpdates() {
    const statusUpdates = document.getElementById('status-updates');

    // Simulating WebSocket connection
    setInterval(() => {
        const randomVehicle = vehicles[Math.floor(Math.random() * vehicles.length)];
        const newStatus = ['active', 'maintenance', 'inactive'][Math.floor(Math.random() * 3)];
        
        if (randomVehicle.status !== newStatus) {
            randomVehicle.status = newStatus;
            const updateItem = document.createElement('li');
            updateItem.textContent = `Vehicle ${randomVehicle.id} changed status to ${newStatus}`;
            updateItem.classList.add('fade-in');
            statusUpdates.prepend(updateItem);

            // Limit the number of displayed updates
            if (statusUpdates.children.length > 5) {
                statusUpdates.removeChild(statusUpdates.lastChild);
            }

            // Show notification
            showNotification(`Vehicle ${randomVehicle.id} is now ${newStatus}`);

            // Update the map
            renderVehicles();

            // Update charts
            updateCharts();
        }
    }, 5000);
}

function showNotification(message) {
    const notificationArea = document.getElementById('notification-area');
    const notification = document.createElement('div');
    notification.classList.add('notification');
    notification.textContent = message;
    notificationArea.appendChild(notification);

    // Fade in
    setTimeout(() => {
        notification.style.opacity = '1';
    }, 100);

    // Remove after 5 seconds
    setTimeout(() => {
        notification.style.opacity = '0';
        setTimeout(() => {
            notificationArea.removeChild(notification);
        }, 500);
    }, 5000);
}

let charts = {};

function initializeCharts() {
    // Vehicle Status Distribution Chart
    const statusCtx = document.getElementById('vehicleStatusChart').getContext('2d');
    charts.statusChart = new Chart(statusCtx, {
        type: 'pie',
        data: {
            labels: ['Active', 'Maintenance', 'Inactive'],
            datasets: [{
                data: [2, 1, 1], // Initial data
                backgroundColor: ['#22c55e', '#eab308', '#ef4444']
            }]
        },
        options: {
            responsive: true,
            title: {
                display: true,
                text: 'Vehicle Status Distribution'
            }
        }
    });

    // Maintenance Tasks Over Time Chart
    const maintenanceCtx = document.getElementById('maintenanceTasksChart').getContext('2d');
    charts.maintenanceChart = new Chart(maintenanceCtx, {
        type: 'line',
        data: {
            labels: ['Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'Apr', 'May', 'Jun'],
            datasets: [{
                label: 'Maintenance Tasks',
                data: [12, 19, 3, 5, 2, 3],
                borderColor: '#3b82f6',
                fill: false
            }]
        },
        options: {
            responsive: true,
            title: {
                display: true,
                text: 'Maintenance Tasks Over Time'
            },
            scales: {
                yAxes: [{
                    ticks: {
                        beginAtZero: true
                    }
                }]
            }
        }
    });

    // Vehicle Utilization Rate Chart
    const utilizationCtx = document.getElementById('vehicleUtilizationChart').getContext('2d');
    charts.utilizationChart = new Chart(utilizationCtx, {
        type: 'bar',
        data: {
            labels: ['Vehicle 1', 'Vehicle 2', 'Vehicle 3', 'Vehicle 4'],
            datasets: [{
                label: 'Utilization Rate (%)',
                data: [75, 62, 80, 55],
                backgroundColor: '#4ade80'
            }]
        },
        options: {
            responsive: true,
            title: {
                display: true,
                text: 'Vehicle Utilization Rate'
            },
            scales: {
                yAxes: [{
                    ticks: {
                        beginAtZero: true,
                        max: 100
                    }
                }]
            }
        }
    });
}

function updateCharts() {
    // Update Vehicle Status Distribution Chart
    const statusCounts = vehicles.reduce((acc, vehicle) => {
        acc[vehicle.status] = (acc[vehicle.status] || 0) + 1;
        return acc;
    }, {});

    charts.statusChart.data.datasets[0].data = [
        statusCounts.active || 0,
        statusCounts.maintenance || 0,
        statusCounts.inactive || 0
    ];
    charts.statusChart.update();

    // Update Maintenance Tasks Over Time Chart
    const newMaintenanceData = charts.maintenanceChart.data.datasets[0].data.slice(1);
    newMaintenanceData.push(Math.floor(Math.random() * 10));
    charts.maintenanceChart.data.datasets[0].data = newMaintenanceData;
    charts.maintenanceChart.update();

    // Update Vehicle Utilization Rate Chart
    const newUtilizationData = vehicles.map(() => Math.floor(Math.random() * 100));
    charts.utilizationChart.data.datasets[0].data = newUtilizationData;
    charts.utilizationChart.update();
}

// API Testing Interface
function setupApiTestingInterface() {
    const endpointSelect = document.getElementById('endpoint-select');
    const endpointSearch = document.getElementById('endpoint-search');
    const requestBody = document.getElementById('request-body');
    const responseBody = document.getElementById('response-body');
    const sendRequestBtn = document.getElementById('send-request');
    const saveRequestBtn = document.getElementById('save-request');
    const loadRequestBtn = document.getElementById('load-request');

    const endpoints = [
        { value: 'get-vehicles', label: 'GET /api/vehicles', method: 'GET', url: '/api/vehicles' },
        { value: 'create-task', label: 'POST /api/tasks', method: 'POST', url: '/api/tasks' },
        { value: 'update-vehicle', label: 'PUT /api/vehicles/{id}', method: 'PUT', url: '/api/vehicles/{id}' },
        { value: 'get-stats', label: 'GET /api/stats', method: 'GET', url: '/api/stats' },
    ];

    // Populate endpoint select
    endpoints.forEach(endpoint => {
        const option = document.createElement('option');
        option.value = endpoint.value;
        option.textContent = endpoint.label;
        endpointSelect.appendChild(option);
    });

    // Endpoint search functionality
    endpointSearch.addEventListener('input', () => {
        const searchTerm = endpointSearch.value.toLowerCase();
        Array.from(endpointSelect.options).forEach(option => {
            const shouldShow = option.text.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm);
            option.style.display = shouldShow ? '' : 'none';
        });
    });

    // Send request
    sendRequestBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
        const selectedEndpoint = endpoints.find(e => e.value === endpointSelect.value);
        if (!selectedEndpoint) return;

        fetch(selectedEndpoint.url, {
            method: selectedEndpoint.method,
            headers: {
                'Content-Type': 'application/json',
            },
            body: selectedEndpoint.method !== 'GET' ? requestBody.textContent : undefined,
        })
        .then(response => response.json())
        .then(data => {
            responseBody.textContent = JSON.stringify(data, null, 2);
            hljs.highlightElement(responseBody);
        })
        .catch(error => {
            responseBody.textContent = `Error: ${error.message}`;
            hljs.highlightElement(responseBody);
        });
    });

    // Save request
    saveRequestBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
        const savedRequests = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('savedRequests') || '{}');
        savedRequests[endpointSelect.value] = requestBody.textContent;
        localStorage.setItem('savedRequests', JSON.stringify(savedRequests));
        alert('Request saved successfully!');
    });

    // Load request
    loadRequestBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
        const savedRequests = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('savedRequests') || '{}');
        const savedRequest = savedRequests[endpointSelect.value];
        if (savedRequest) {
            requestBody.textContent = savedRequest;
            hljs.highlightElement(requestBody);
        } else {
            alert('No saved request found for this endpoint.');
        }
    });

    // Initialize syntax highlighting
    hljs.highlightElement(requestBody);
    hljs.highlightElement(responseBody);
}

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
    initializeMap();
    setupRealTimeUpdates();
    initializeCharts();
    setupApiTestingInterface();
});
</code_agent_write_file>

body {

.full-width {
    grid-column: 1 / -1;
}

.card-header {
    padding: 1rem;

}

.card-header h2 {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: 1.25rem;
    color: #111827;
}

.card-content {
    padding: 1rem;
}

#fleet-map {
    width: 100%;
    height: 400px;
    background-color: #e5e7eb;
    border-radius: 0.25rem;
}

#status-updates {
    list-style-type: none;
    padding: 0;

    max-height: 200px;
    overflow-y: auto;
}

#status-updates li {
    padding: 0.5rem;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
}

#notification-area {
    position: fixed;
    top: 20px;
    right: 20px;
    z-index: 1000;
}

.notification {
    background-color: #4CAF50;
    color: white;
    padding: 15px;
    margin-bottom: 15px;
    border-radius: 5px;
    opacity: 0;
    transition: opacity 0.5s;
}

.api-testing-container {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    gap: 1rem;
}

.endpoint-selection {
    display: flex;
    gap: 1rem;
}

#endpoint-search, #endpoint-select {
    flex: 1;
    padding: 0.5rem;
    border: 1px solid #d1d5db;
    border-radius: 0.25rem;
}

.request-response-container {
    display: flex;
    gap: 1rem;
}

.request-container, .response-container {
    flex: 1;
}

pre {
    background-color: #f3f4f6;
    padding: 1rem;

}

.button-group {

button {

button:hover {

}

@media (max-width: 768px) {

    }
}

.fade-in {
    animation: fadeIn 0.5s;
}

@keyframes fadeIn {
    from { opacity: 0; }
    to { opacity: 1; }
}

// API Testing Interface
function setupApiTestingInterface() {
    const endpointSelect = document.getElementById('endpoint-select');
    const endpointSearch = document.getElementById('endpoint-search');
    const requestBody = document.getElementById('request-body');
    const responseBody = document.getElementById('response-body');
    const sendRequestBtn = document.getElementById('send-request');
    const saveRequestBtn = document.getElementById('save-request');
    const loadRequestBtn = document.getElementById('load-request');

    const endpoints = [
        { value: 'get-vehicles', label: 'GET /fleet/vehicles', method: 'GET', url: '/fleet/vehicles' },
        { value: 'create-task', label: 'POST /fleet/task', method: 'POST', url: '/fleet/task' },
        { value: 'get-fleet-status', label: 'GET /fleet/status', method: 'GET', url: '/fleet/status' },
        { value: 'get-maintenance-schedule', label: 'GET /maintenance/schedule', method: 'GET', url: '/maintenance/schedule' },
        { value: 'create-maintenance-task', label: 'POST /maintenance/task', method: 'POST', url: '/maintenance/task' },
        { value: 'get-predictive-maintenance', label: 'GET /predictive-maintenance', method: 'GET', url: '/predictive-maintenance' },
        { value: 'get-stations', label: 'GET /rebalancing/stations', method: 'GET', url: '/rebalancing/stations' },
        { value: 'schedule-rebalancing', label: 'POST /rebalancing/task', method: 'POST', url: '/rebalancing/task' },
        { value: 'get-optimization-suggestions', label: 'POST /optimization/suggestions', method: 'POST', url: '/optimization/suggestions' },
    ];

    // Populate endpoint select
    endpoints.forEach(endpoint => {
        const option = document.createElement('option');
        option.value = endpoint.value;
        option.textContent = endpoint.label;
        endpointSelect.appendChild(option);
    });

    // Endpoint search functionality
    endpointSearch.addEventListener('input', () => {
        const searchTerm = endpointSearch.value.toLowerCase();
        Array.from(endpointSelect.options).forEach(option => {
            const shouldShow = option.text.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm);
            option.style.display = shouldShow ? '' : 'none';
        });
    });

    // Send request
    sendRequestBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
        const selectedEndpoint = endpoints.find(e => e.value === endpointSelect.value);
        if (!selectedEndpoint) {
            responseBody.textContent = 'Please select an endpoint';
            hljs.highlightElement(responseBody);
            return;
        }

        let url = selectedEndpoint.url;
        let body = undefined;

        if (selectedEndpoint.method !== 'GET') {
            try {
                body = JSON.parse(requestBody.textContent);
            } catch (error) {
                responseBody.textContent = `Error parsing request body: ${error.message}`;
                hljs.highlightElement(responseBody);
                return;
            }
        }

        fetch(url, {
            method: selectedEndpoint.method,
            headers: {
                'Content-Type': 'application/json',
            },
            body: body ? JSON.stringify(body) : undefined,
        })
        .then(response => {
            if (!response.ok) {
                throw new Error(`HTTP error! status: ${response.status}`);
            }
            return response.json();
        })
        .then(data => {
            responseBody.textContent = JSON.stringify(data, null, 2);
            hljs.highlightElement(responseBody);
        })
        .catch(error => {
            responseBody.textContent = `Error: ${error.message}`;
            hljs.highlightElement(responseBody);
        });
    });

    // Save request
    saveRequestBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
        const savedRequests = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('savedRequests') || '{}');
        savedRequests[endpointSelect.value] = requestBody.textContent;
        localStorage.setItem('savedRequests', JSON.stringify(savedRequests));
        alert('Request saved successfully!');
    });

    // Load request
    loadRequestBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
        const savedRequests = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('savedRequests') || '{}');
        const savedRequest = savedRequests[endpointSelect.value];
        if (savedRequest) {
            requestBody.textContent = savedRequest;
            hljs.highlightElement(requestBody);
        } else {
            alert('No saved request found for this endpoint.');
        }
    });

    // Initialize syntax highlighting
    hljs.highlightElement(requestBody);
    hljs.highlightElement(responseBody);
}

// ... (rest of the code remains unchanged)
</code_agent_write_file>

from flask import Flask, render_template, jsonify
from flask_migrate import Migrate
from extensions import db
from api import fleet, maintenance, rebalancing, user, reporting, integration, future_modules
import os
import logging

def create_app():
    app = Flask(__name__, static_folder='static', template_folder='templates')

    # Configure logging
    logging.basicConfig(filename='app.log', level=logging.DEBUG)
    logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)

    # Database configuration
    app.config['SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI'] = os.environ.get('DATABASE_URL')
    app.config['SQLALCHEMY_TRACK_MODIFICATIONS'] = False
    
    db.init_app(app)
    migrate = Migrate(app, db)

    # Register blueprints
    app.register_blueprint(fleet.bp)
    app.register_blueprint(maintenance.bp)
    app.register_blueprint(rebalancing.bp)
    app.register_blueprint(user.bp)
    app.register_blueprint(reporting.bp)
    app.register_blueprint(integration.bp)
    app.register_blueprint(future_modules.bp)

    @app.route('/')
    def index():
        app.logger.debug(f"Rendering template: {app.template_folder}/index.html")
        return render_template('index.html')

    @app.errorhandler(404)
    def not_found(error):
        logger.error(f"404 error: {error}")
        return jsonify({"error": "Not found", "message": str(error)}), 404

    @app.errorhandler(500)
    def server_error(error):
        logger.error(f"500 error: {error}")
        return jsonify({"error": "Internal server error", "message": str(error)}), 500

    @app.errorhandler(Exception)
    def handle_exception(e):
        logger.error(f"Unhandled exception: {str(e)}")
        return jsonify({"error": "An unexpected error occurred", "message": str(e)}), 500

    return app

if __name__ == '__main__':
    app = create_app()
    app.run(host='0.0.0.0', port=5000, debug=True)
</code_agent_write_file>

from flask import Flask, render_template, jsonify
from flask_migrate import Migrate
from extensions import db
from api import fleet, maintenance, rebalancing, user, reporting, integration, future_modules
import os
import logging

def create_app():
    app = Flask(__name__, static_folder='static', template_folder='templates')

    # Configure logging
    logging.basicConfig(filename='app.log', level=logging.DEBUG)
    logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)

    # Database configuration
    app.config['SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI'] = os.environ.get('DATABASE_URL')
    app.config['SQLALCHEMY_TRACK_MODIFICATIONS'] = False
    
    db.init_app(app)
    migrate = Migrate(app, db)

    # Register blueprints
    app.register_blueprint(fleet.bp)
    app.register_blueprint(maintenance.bp)
    app.register_blueprint(rebalancing.bp)
    app.register_blueprint(user.bp)
    app.register_blueprint(reporting.bp)
    app.register_blueprint(integration.bp)
    app.register_blueprint(future_modules.bp)

    @app.route('/')
    def index():
        app.logger.debug(f"Rendering template: {app.template_folder}/index.html")
        return render_template('index.html')

    @app.errorhandler(404)
    def not_found(error):
        logger.error(f"404 error: {error}")
        return jsonify({"error": "Not found", "message": str(error)}), 404

    @app.errorhandler(500)
    def server_error(error):
        logger.error(f"500 error: {error}")
        return jsonify({"error": "Internal server error", "message": str(error)}), 500

    @app.errorhandler(Exception)
    def handle_exception(e):
        logger.error(f"Unhandled exception: {str(e)}")
        return jsonify({"error": "An unexpected error occurred", "message": str(e)}), 500

    return app

if __name__ == '__main__':
    app = create_app()
    app.run(host='0.0.0.0', port=5000, debug=True)

    // ... (previous notification code)

function initializeCharts() {
    try {
        // Vehicle Status Distribution Chart
        const statusCtx = document.getElementById('vehicleStatusChart').getContext('2d');
        charts.statusChart = new Chart(statusCtx, {
            type: 'pie',
            data: {
                labels: ['Active', 'Maintenance', 'Inactive'],
                datasets: [{
                    data: [2, 1, 1], // Initial data
                    backgroundColor: ['#22c55e', '#eab308', '#ef4444']
                }]
            },
            options: {
                responsive: true,
                title: {
                    display: true,
                    text: 'Vehicle Status Distribution'
                }
            }
        });

        // Maintenance Tasks Over Time Chart
        const maintenanceCtx = document.getElementById('maintenanceTasksChart').getContext('2d');
        charts.maintenanceChart = new Chart(maintenanceCtx, {
            type: 'line',
            data: {
                labels: ['Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'Apr', 'May', 'Jun'],
                datasets: [{
                    label: 'Maintenance Tasks',
                    data: [12, 19, 3, 5, 2, 3],
                    borderColor: '#3b82f6',
                    fill: false
                }]
            },
            options: {
                responsive: true,
                title: {
                    display: true,
                    text: 'Maintenance Tasks Over Time'
                },
                scales: {
                    yAxes: [{
                        ticks: {
                            beginAtZero: true
                        }
                    }]
                }
            }
        });

        // Vehicle Utilization Rate Chart
        const utilizationCtx = document.getElementById('vehicleUtilizationChart').getContext('2d');
        charts.utilizationChart = new Chart(utilizationCtx, {
            type: 'bar',
            data: {
                labels: ['Vehicle 1', 'Vehicle 2', 'Vehicle 3', 'Vehicle 4'],
                datasets: [{
                    label: 'Utilization Rate (%)',
                    data: [75, 62, 80, 55],
                    backgroundColor: '#4ade80'
                }]
            },
            options: {
                responsive: true,
                title: {
                    display: true,
                    text: 'Vehicle Utilization Rate'
                },
                scales: {
                    yAxes: [{
                        ticks: {
                            beginAtZero: true,
                            max: 100
                        }
                    }]
                }
            }
        });
    } catch (error) {
        console.error('Error initializing charts:', error);
        showNotification('Error initializing charts. Please try refreshing the page.');
    }
}

function updateCharts() {
    try {
        // Update Vehicle Status Distribution Chart
        const statusCounts = vehicles.reduce((acc, vehicle) => {
            acc[vehicle.status] = (acc[vehicle.status] || 0) + 1;
            return acc;
        }, {});

        charts.statusChart.data.datasets[0].data = [
            statusCounts.active || 0,
            statusCounts.maintenance || 0,
            statusCounts.inactive || 0
        ];
        charts.statusChart.update();

        // Update Maintenance Tasks Over Time Chart
        const newMaintenanceData = charts.maintenanceChart.data.datasets[0].data.slice(1);
        newMaintenanceData.push(Math.floor(Math.random() * 10));
        charts.maintenanceChart.data.datasets[0].data = newMaintenanceData;
        charts.maintenanceChart.update();

        // Update Vehicle Utilization Rate Chart
        const newUtilizationData = vehicles.map(() => Math.floor(Math.random() * 100));
        charts.utilizationChart.data.datasets[0].data = newUtilizationData;
        charts.utilizationChart.update();
    } catch (error) {
        console.error('Error updating charts:', error);
        showNotification('Error updating charts. Please try refreshing the page.');
    }
}

function setupApiTestingInterface() {
    // ... (previous API testing interface code)
}

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
    initializeMap();
    setupRealTimeUpdates();
    initializeCharts();
    setupApiTestingInterface();

    // Update charts periodically
    setInterval(updateCharts, 5000);
});

// Global variables
let map;
let vehicles = [
    { id: 1, x: 100, y: 150, status: 'active' },
    { id: 2, x: 300, y: 200, status: 'maintenance' },
    { id: 3, x: 200, y: 300, status: 'inactive' },
    { id: 4, x: 400, y: 100, status: 'active' },
];

let charts = {};

function initializeMap() {
    try {
        const mapContainer = document.getElementById('fleet-map');
        if (!mapContainer) {
            throw new Error('Map container not found');
        }

        const mapSvg = document.createElementNS('http://www.w3.org/2000/svg', 'svg');
        mapSvg.setAttribute('width', '100%');
        mapSvg.setAttribute('height', '100%');
        mapSvg.setAttribute('viewBox', '0 0 1000 800');

        // Background
        const background = document.createElementNS('http://www.w3.org/2000/svg', 'rect');
        background.setAttribute('width', '1000');
        background.setAttribute('height', '800');
        background.setAttribute('fill', '#e6e8e6');
        mapSvg.appendChild(background);

        // Water bodies
        const water = document.createElementNS('http://www.w3.org/2000/svg', 'path');
        water.setAttribute('d', 'M0 600 Q 250 550, 500 600 T 1000 600 V 800 H 0 Z');
        water.setAttribute('fill', '#a5d5f5');
        mapSvg.appendChild(water);

        // Roads
        const roads = document.createElementNS('http://www.w3.org/2000/svg', 'g');
        roads.setAttribute('stroke', '#ffffff');
        roads.setAttribute('stroke-width', '20');

        const roadPaths = [
            'M0 200 H1000', 'M0 400 H1000', 'M0 600 H1000',
            'M200 0 V800', 'M500 0 V800', 'M800 0 V800'
        ];

        roadPaths.forEach(path => {
            const road = document.createElementNS('http://www.w3.org/2000/svg', 'path');
            road.setAttribute('d', path);
            roads.appendChild(road);
        });

        mapSvg.appendChild(roads);

        // Add vehicles
        const vehiclesGroup = document.createElementNS('http://www.w3.org/2000/svg', 'g');
        vehicles.forEach(vehicle => {
            const vehicleCircle = document.createElementNS('http://www.w3.org/2000/svg', 'circle');
            vehicleCircle.setAttribute('cx', vehicle.x);
            vehicleCircle.setAttribute('cy', vehicle.y);
            vehicleCircle.setAttribute('r', '10');
            vehicleCircle.setAttribute('fill', getVehicleColor(vehicle.status));
            vehiclesGroup.appendChild(vehicleCircle);

            const vehicleLabel = document.createElementNS('http://www.w3.org/2000/svg', 'text');
            vehicleLabel.setAttribute('x', vehicle.x);
            vehicleLabel.setAttribute('y', vehicle.y + 5);
            vehicleLabel.setAttribute('text-anchor', 'middle');
            vehicleLabel.setAttribute('fill', '#ffffff');
            vehicleLabel.setAttribute('font-size', '10');
            vehicleLabel.textContent = vehicle.id;
            vehiclesGroup.appendChild(vehicleLabel);
        });

        mapSvg.appendChild(vehiclesGroup);

        mapContainer.appendChild(mapSvg);
        map = mapSvg;  // Store the map for later use
    } catch (error) {
        console.error('Error initializing map:', error);
        showNotification('Error initializing map. Please try refreshing the page.');
    }
}

function getVehicleColor(status) {
    switch (status) {
        case 'active': return '#22c55e';
        case 'maintenance': return '#eab308';
        case 'inactive': return '#ef4444';
        default: return '#3b82f6';
    }
}

function setupRealTimeUpdates() {
    try {
        const statusUpdates = document.getElementById('status-updates');
        if (!statusUpdates) {
            throw new Error('Status updates container not found');
        }

        // Simulate real-time updates
        setInterval(() => {
            const randomVehicle = vehicles[Math.floor(Math.random() * vehicles.length)];
            const newStatus = ['active', 'maintenance', 'inactive'][Math.floor(Math.random() * 3)];
            const update = document.createElement('li');
            update.textContent = `Vehicle ${randomVehicle.id} status changed to ${newStatus}`;
            update.classList.add('fade-in');
            statusUpdates.prepend(update);

            // Update vehicle on the map
            const vehicleCircle = map.querySelector(`circle[cx="${randomVehicle.x}"][cy="${randomVehicle.y}"]`);
            if (vehicleCircle) {
                vehicleCircle.setAttribute('fill', getVehicleColor(newStatus));
            }

            // Remove old updates if there are more than 5
            if (statusUpdates.children.length > 5) {
                statusUpdates.removeChild(statusUpdates.lastChild);
            }

            // Update vehicle data
            randomVehicle.status = newStatus;

            // Update charts
            updateCharts();
        }, 5000);  // Update every 5 seconds
    } catch (error) {
        console.error('Error setting up real-time updates:', error);
        showNotification('Error setting up real-time updates. Please try refreshing the page.');
    }
}

function showNotification(message) {
    const notificationArea = document.getElementById('notification-area');
    if (notificationArea) {
        const notification = document.createElement('div');
        notification.textContent = message;
        notification.classList.add('notification', 'fade-in');
        notificationArea.appendChild(notification);
        setTimeout(() => {
            notification.remove();
        }, 5000);
    } else {
        console.error('Notification area not found');
    }
}

// ... (rest of the code remains unchanged)

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
    try {
        initializeMap();
        setupRealTimeUpdates();
        initializeCharts();
        setupApiTestingInterface();

        // Update charts periodically
        setInterval(updateCharts, 5000);
    } catch (error) {
        console.error('Error initializing application:', error);
        showNotification('Error initializing application. Please try refreshing the page.');
    }
});

from flask import Blueprint, jsonify, request
from models import User, Role
from extensions import db
from sqlalchemy.exc import SQLAlchemyError
import logging
from marshmallow import Schema, fields, ValidationError

bp = Blueprint('auth', __name__, url_prefix='/api/v1/auth')

logging.basicConfig(level=logging.ERROR)
logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)

class UserSchema(Schema):
    username = fields.String(required=True)
    password = fields.String(required=True)
    email = fields.Email(required=True)

class LoginSchema(Schema):
    username = fields.String(required=True)
    password = fields.String(required=True)

class RoleSchema(Schema):
    name = fields.String(required=True)
    description = fields.String()

@bp.route('/register', methods=['POST'])
def register():
    """
    Register a new user
    ---
    parameters:
      - name: user
        in: body
        required: true
        schema:
          $ref: '#/definitions/User'
    responses:
      201:
        description: User registered successfully
      400:
        description: Invalid input
      500:
        description: Internal server error
    """
    try:
        schema = UserSchema()
        data = schema.load(request.json)
    except ValidationError as err:
        return jsonify({"error": "Invalid input", "details": err.messages}), 400

    try:
        new_user = User(username=data['username'], email=data['email'])
        new_user.set_password(data['password'])
        db.session.add(new_user)
        db.session.commit()
        return jsonify({"message": "User registered successfully", "user_id": new_user.id}), 201
    except SQLAlchemyError as e:
        logger.error(f"Database error in register: {str(e)}")
        db.session.rollback()
        return jsonify({"error": "An error occurred while registering the user"}), 500

@bp.route('/login', methods=['POST'])
def login():
    """
    Login a user
    ---
    parameters:
      - name: credentials
        in: body
        required: true
        schema:
          $ref: '#/definitions/Login'
    responses:
      200:
        description: User logged in successfully
      400:
        description: Invalid credentials
      500:
        description: Internal server error
    """
    try:
        schema = LoginSchema()
        data = schema.load(request.json)
    except ValidationError as err:
        return jsonify({"error": "Invalid input", "details": err.messages}), 400

    try:
        user = User.query.filter_by(username=data['username']).first()
        if user and user.check_password(data['password']):
            # In a real application, you would generate and return a token here
            return jsonify({"message": "User logged in successfully", "user_id": user.id}), 200
        else:
            return jsonify({"error": "Invalid credentials"}), 400
    except SQLAlchemyError as e:
        logger.error(f"Database error in login: {str(e)}")
        return jsonify({"error": "An error occurred while logging in"}), 500

@bp.route('/logout', methods=['POST'])
def logout():
    """
    Logout a user
    ---
    responses:
      200:
        description: User logged out successfully
      500:
        description: Internal server error
    """
    # In a real application, you would invalidate the user's token here
    return jsonify({"message": "User logged out successfully"}), 200

@bp.route('/me', methods=['GET'])
def get_current_user():
    """
    Get details of the currently logged-in user
    ---
    responses:
      200:
        description: Current user details
      401:
        description: Unauthorized
      500:
        description: Internal server error
    """
    # In a real application, you would get the user from the token
    # For this example, we'll just return a mock user
    try:
        user = {
            "id": 1,
            "username": "testuser",
            "email": "testuser@example.com",
            "role": "user"
        }
        return jsonify(user), 200
    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"Error in get_current_user: {str(e)}")
        return jsonify({"error": "An error occurred while fetching user details"}), 500

@bp.route('/roles', methods=['GET'])
def get_roles():
    """
    Retrieve the list of user roles
    ---
    responses:
      200:
        description: List of user roles
      500:
        description: Internal server error
    """
    try:
        roles = Role.query.all()
        return jsonify([{"id": role.id, "name": role.name, "description": role.description} for role in roles]), 200
    except SQLAlchemyError as e:
        logger.error(f"Database error in get_roles: {str(e)}")
        return jsonify({"error": "An error occurred while fetching roles"}), 500

@bp.route('/roles', methods=['POST'])
def create_role():
    """
    Create a new user role
    ---
    parameters:
      - name: role
        in: body
        required: true
        schema:
          $ref: '#/definitions/Role'
    responses:
      201:
        description: Role created successfully
      400:
        description: Invalid input
      500:
        description: Internal server error
    """
    try:
        schema = RoleSchema()
        data = schema.load(request.json)
    except ValidationError as err:
        return jsonify({"error": "Invalid input", "details": err.messages}), 400

    try:
        new_role = Role(name=data['name'], description=data.get('description'))
        db.session.add(new_role)
        db.session.commit()
        return jsonify({"message": "Role created successfully", "role_id": new_role.id}), 201
    except SQLAlchemyError as e:
        logger.error(f"Database error in create_role: {str(e)}")
        db.session.rollback()
        return jsonify({"error": "An error occurred while creating the role"}), 500

# Add more endpoints for updating and deleting roles, and assigning/removing roles from users
</code_agent_write_file>
