agent_memory.message:
<code_agent_thoughts>
To improve the UI/UX of the Lattis API Sandbox, we'll focus on enhancing the visual appeal and user interaction of the existing interface. Let's start by updating the CSS to create a more modern and visually appealing design. We'll modify the `static/css/style.css` file to implement these changes.
</code_agent_thoughts>
<code_agent_write_file file_path="static/css/style.css">
:root {
    --primary-color: #3a7bd5;
    --secondary-color: #00d2ff;
    --background-color: #f5f7fa;
    --text-color: #333333;
    --card-background: #ffffff;
    --border-radius: 8px;
    --box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

body {
    font-family: 'Roboto', Arial, sans-serif;
    line-height: 1.6;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    background-color: var(--background-color);
    color: var(--text-color);
}

header {
    background: linear-gradient(to right, var(--primary-color), var(--secondary-color));
    color: #ffffff;
    padding: 1rem;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-items: center;
    box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
}

header h1 {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    font-weight: 700;
}

.container {
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 2rem 1rem;
}

.panel-container {
    display: flex;
    gap: 2rem;
    margin-bottom: 2rem;
}

.left-panel, .right-panel {
    flex: 1;
    background-color: var(--card-background);
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    padding: 1.5rem;
    box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
}

.central-section {
    background-color: var(--card-background);
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    padding: 1.5rem;
    box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
    margin-bottom: 2rem;
}

select, input, button, textarea {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 0.75rem;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
    border: 1px solid #e0e0e0;
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    font-size: 1rem;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

select:focus, input:focus, textarea:focus {
    outline: none;
    border-color: var(--primary-color);
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(58, 123, 213, 0.2);
}

button {
    background: linear-gradient(to right, var(--primary-color), var(--secondary-color));
    color: #ffffff;
    border: none;
    cursor: pointer;
    font-weight: bold;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

button:hover {
    opacity: 0.9;
    transform: translateY(-2px);
}

button:active {
    transform: translateY(0);
}

.token-container {
    display: flex;
    gap: 0.5rem;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.token-container input {
    flex-grow: 1;
    margin-bottom: 0;
}

.token-container button {
    width: auto;
    white-space: nowrap;
}

details {
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
    background-color: #f0f0f0;
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    padding: 0.5rem;
}

summary {
    cursor: pointer;
    font-weight: bold;
    padding: 0.5rem;
}

#fleet-map {
    height: 400px;
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    overflow: hidden;
    box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
}

pre {
    background-color: #f4f4f4;
    padding: 1rem;
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    overflow-x: auto;
    font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.response-container {
    position: relative;
}

.spinner {
    display: none;
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
    width: 50px;
    height: 50px;
    border: 5px solid #f3f3f3;
    border-top: 5px solid var(--primary-color);
    border-radius: 50%;
    animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes spin {
    0% { transform: translate(-50%, -50%) rotate(0deg); }
    100% { transform: translate(-50%, -50%) rotate(360deg); }
}

#notification-area {
    position: fixed;
    top: 1rem;
    right: 1rem;
    z-index: 1000;
}

.notification {
    background-color: #4CAF50;
    color: white;
    padding: 1rem;
    margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
    opacity: 0;
    transition: opacity 0.3s ease-in-out;
}

.notification.show {
    opacity: 1;
}

.dashboard-section {
    margin-top: 2rem;
}

.dashboard-grid {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(200px, 1fr));
    gap: 1rem;
}

.dashboard-card {
    background-color: var(--card-background);
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    padding: 1rem;
    box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
    text-align: center;
}

.dashboard-card h3 {
    margin-top: 0;
    color: var(--primary-color);
}

.dashboard-card p {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    font-weight: bold;
    margin: 0;
}

.modal {
    display: none;
    position: fixed;
    z-index: 1000;
    left: 0;
    top: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.4);
}

.modal-content {
    background-color: var(--card-background);
    margin: 15% auto;
    padding: 2rem;
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
    width: 80%;
    max-width: 600px;
}

.close {
    color: #aaa;
    float: right;
    font-size: 28px;
    font-weight: bold;
    cursor: pointer;
}

.close:hover,
.close:focus {
    color: #000;
    text-decoration: none;
    cursor: pointer;
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
    .panel-container {
        flex-direction: column;
    }

    .left-panel, .right-panel {
        width: 100%;
    }
}
</code_agent_write_file>

Now that we have updated both the CSS and HTML, let's enhance the JavaScript to improve user interaction and add some new features. We'll modify the `static/js/main.js` file to implement these changes. document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => { initializeMap(); setupDarkModeToggle(); setupAPIInteraction(); setupHelpModal(); updateDashboard(); }); function initializeMap() { mapboxgl.accessToken = MAPBOX_ACCESS_TOKEN; const map = new mapboxgl.Map({ container: 'fleet-map', style: 'mapbox://styles/mapbox/streets-v11', center: [-122.4194, 37.7749], zoom: 12 }); // Add markers for sample vehicles const vehicles = [ { id: 1, coordinates: [-122.4194, 37.7749], status: 'active' }, { id: 2, coordinates: [-122.4099, 37.7850], status: 'maintenance' }, { id: 3, coordinates: [-122.4289, 37.7648], status: 'inactive' }, ]; vehicles.forEach(vehicle => { const el = document.createElement('div'); el.className = 'vehicle-marker'; el.style.backgroundColor = getVehicleColor(vehicle.status); el.style.width = '20px'; el.style.height = '20px'; el.style.borderRadius = '50%'; el.style.border = '2px solid white'; new mapboxgl.Marker(el) .setLngLat(vehicle.coordinates) .setPopup(new mapboxgl.Popup().setHTML(`Vehicle ${vehicle.id}
Status: ${vehicle.status}`)) .addTo(map); }); } function getVehicleColor(status) { switch (status) { case 'active': return '#22c55e'; case 'maintenance': return '#eab308'; case 'inactive': return '#ef4444'; default: return '#3b82f6'; } } function setupDarkModeToggle() { const darkModeToggle = document.getElementById('dark-mode-toggle'); const body = document.body; darkModeToggle.addEventListener('click', () => { body.classList.toggle('dark-mode'); localStorage.setItem('darkMode', body.classList.contains('dark-mode')); darkModeToggle.textContent = body.classList.contains('dark-mode') ? '🌞' : '🌓'; }); if (localStorage.getItem('darkMode') === 'true') { body.classList.add('dark-mode'); darkModeToggle.textContent = '🌞'; } } function setupAPIInteraction() { const apiCategorySelect = document.getElementById('api-category-select'); const apiEndpointSelect = document.getElementById('api-endpoint-select'); const optionalParameters = document.getElementById('optional-parameters'); const accessTokenInput = document.getElementById('access-token'); const generateTestTokenBtn = document.getElementById('generate-test-token-btn'); const tryExampleBtn = document.getElementById('try-example-btn'); const sendRequestBtn = document.getElementById('send-request-btn'); const requestUrl = document.getElementById('request-url'); const responseBody = document.getElementById('response-body'); const loadingSpinner = document.getElementById('loading-spinner'); apiCategorySelect.addEventListener('change', updateEndpoints); apiEndpointSelect.addEventListener('change', updateOptionalParameters); generateTestTokenBtn.addEventListener('click', generateTestToken); tryExampleBtn.addEventListener('click', loadExample); sendRequestBtn.addEventListener('click', sendRequest); function updateEndpoints() { const category = apiCategorySelect.value; apiEndpointSelect.innerHTML = ''; const endpoints = getEndpointsForCategory(category); endpoints.forEach(endpoint => { const option = document.createElement('option'); option.value = endpoint.value; option.textContent = endpoint.label; apiEndpointSelect.appendChild(option); }); } function getEndpointsForCategory(category) { // Implement the logic to return endpoints for each category const endpoints = { fleet: [ { value: 'get_vehicles', label: 'GET /vehicles' }, { value: 'create_vehicle', label: 'POST /vehicles' }, { value: 'update_vehicle', label: 'PUT /vehicles/{id}' }, { value: 'get_fleet_status', label: 'GET /fleet/status' } ], user: [ { value: 'get_user', label: 'GET /user' }, { value: 'create_user', label: 'POST /user' }, { value: 'update_user', label: 'PUT /user/{id}' }, { value: 'get_user_activity', label: 'GET /user/activity' } ], trip: [ { value: 'start_trip', label: 'POST /trip' }, { value: 'end_trip', label: 'PUT /trip/{id}' }, { value: 'get_trip', label: 'GET /trip/{id}' }, { value: 'list_trips', label: 'GET /trips' } ], maintenance: [ { value: 'create_maintenance_task', label: 'POST /maintenance' }, { value: 'update_maintenance_task', label: 'PUT /maintenance/{id}' }, { value: 'get_maintenance_history', label: 'GET /maintenance/history' }, { value: 'get_predictive_maintenance', label: 'GET /maintenance/predictive' } ], analytics: [ { value: 'get_usage_stats', label: 'GET /analytics/usage' }, { value: 'generate_report', label: 'POST /analytics/report' }, { value: 'get_report', label: 'GET /analytics/report/{id}' } ], payment: [ { value: 'create_invoice', label: 'POST /payment/invoice' }, { value: 'get_invoice', label: 'GET /payment/invoice/{id}' }, { value: 'process_payment', label: 'POST /payment/process' } ], location: [ { value: 'create_geofence', label: 'POST /location/geofence' }, { value: 'update_geofence', label: 'PUT /location/geofence/{id}' }, { value: 'get_geofences', label: 'GET /location/geofences' } ] }; return endpoints[category] || []; } function updateOptionalParameters() { optionalParameters.innerHTML = ''; const endpoint = apiEndpointSelect.value; const params = getParametersForEndpoint(endpoint); params.forEach(param => { const input = document.createElement('input'); input.type = 'text'; input.id = param.id; input.placeholder = param.placeholder; optionalParameters.appendChild(input); }); } function getParametersForEndpoint(endpoint) { // Define parameters for each endpoint const parameters = { update_vehicle: [ { id: 'vehicle-id', placeholder: 'Vehicle ID' }, { id: 'vehicle-status', placeholder: 'New Status' } ], create_maintenance_task: [ { id: 'vehicle-id', placeholder: 'Vehicle ID' }, { id: 'task-description', placeholder: 'Task Description' } ], // Add more parameters for other endpoints as needed }; return parameters[endpoint] || []; } function generateTestToken() { fetch('/api/v1/auth/generate-test-token', { method: 'POST', }) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { accessTokenInput.value = data.test_token; showNotification('Test API Access Token generated successfully.', 'success'); }) .catch(error => { showNotification('Failed to generate Test API Access Token.', 'error'); }); } function loadExample() { const endpoint = apiEndpointSelect.value; // Implement logic to load example data for the selected endpoint const exampleData = getExampleDataForEndpoint(endpoint); Object.keys(exampleData).forEach(key => { const input = document.getElementById(key); if (input) { input.value = exampleData[key]; } }); showNotification('Example data loaded.', 'info'); } function getExampleDataForEndpoint(endpoint) { // Define example data for each endpoint const exampleData = { update_vehicle: { 'vehicle-id': '1234', 'vehicle-status': 'maintenance' }, create_maintenance_task: { 'vehicle-id': '5678', 'task-description': 'Routine oil change' }, // Add more example data for other endpoints as needed }; return exampleData[endpoint] || {}; } function sendRequest() { const endpoint = apiEndpointSelect.value; const accessToken = accessTokenInput.value; if (!endpoint || !accessToken) { showNotification('Please select an endpoint and enter an access token.', 'error'); return; } const url = getApiUrl(endpoint); const method = getApiMethod(endpoint); const body = getRequestBody(endpoint); requestUrl.textContent = `${method}: ${url}`; requestUrl.className = 'code-block'; showNotification('Sending request...', 'info'); loadingSpinner.style.display = 'block'; responseBody.style.opacity = '0.5'; fetch(url, { method: method, headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Authorization': `Bearer ${accessToken}` }, body: method !== 'GET' ? JSON.stringify(body) : undefined }) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { responseBody.textContent = JSON.stringify(data, null, 2); hljs.highlightElement(responseBody); showNotification('Request completed successfully.', 'success'); }) .catch(error => { responseBody.textContent = `Error: ${error.message}`; showNotification('An error occurred while sending the request.', 'error'); }) .finally(() => { loadingSpinner.style.display = 'none'; responseBody.style.opacity = '1'; }); } function getApiUrl(endpoint) { return `/api/v1/${endpoint.replace('_', '/')}`; } function getApiMethod(endpoint) { if (endpoint.startsWith('get')) return 'GET'; if (endpoint.startsWith('create')) return 'POST'; if (endpoint.startsWith('update')) return 'PUT'; if (endpoint.startsWith('delete')) return 'DELETE'; return 'GET'; } function getRequestBody(endpoint) { const body = {}; const params = getParametersForEndpoint(endpoint); params.forEach(param => { const input = document.getElementById(param.id); if (input && input.value) { body[param.id] = input.value; } }); return body; } } function setupHelpModal() { const modal = document.getElementById('help-modal'); const btn = document.getElementById('help-button'); const span = document.getElementsByClassName('close')[0]; btn.onclick = function() { modal.style.display = 'block'; } span.onclick = function() { modal.style.display = 'none'; } window.onclick = function(event) { if (event.target == modal) { modal.style.display = 'none'; } } } function updateDashboard() { // This function should fetch real data from your API // For now, we'll use placeholder data document.getElementById('total-vehicles').textContent = '150'; document.getElementById('active-trips').textContent = '42'; document.getElementById('maintenance-tasks').textContent = '7'; document.getElementById('revenue-today').textContent = '$3,250'; } function showNotification(message, type = 'info') { const notificationArea = document.getElementById('notification-area'); const notification = document.createElement('div'); notification.className = `notification ${type}`; notification.textContent = message; notificationArea.appendChild(notification); setTimeout(() => { notification.classList.add('show'); }, 10); setTimeout(() => { notification.classList.remove('show'); setTimeout(() => { notificationArea.removeChild(notification); }, 300); }, 3000); }

Now that we have updated both the CSS and HTML, let's enhance the JavaScript to improve user interaction and add some new features. We'll modify the `static/js/main.js` file to implement these changes. document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => { initializeMap(); setupDarkModeToggle(); setupAPIInteraction(); setupHelpModal(); updateDashboard(); }); function initializeMap() { mapboxgl.accessToken = MAPBOX_ACCESS_TOKEN; const map = new mapboxgl.Map({ container: 'fleet-map', style: 'mapbox://styles/mapbox/streets-v11', center: [-122.4194, 37.7749], zoom: 12 }); // Add markers for sample vehicles const vehicles = [ { id: 1, coordinates: [-122.4194, 37.7749], status: 'active' }, { id: 2, coordinates: [-122.4099, 37.7850], status: 'maintenance' }, { id: 3, coordinates: [-122.4289, 37.7648], status: 'inactive' }, ]; vehicles.forEach(vehicle => { const el = document.createElement('div'); el.className = 'vehicle-marker'; el.style.backgroundColor = getVehicleColor(vehicle.status); el.style.width = '20px'; el.style.height = '20px'; el.style.borderRadius = '50%'; el.style.border = '2px solid white'; new mapboxgl.Marker(el) .setLngLat(vehicle.coordinates) .setPopup(new mapboxgl.Popup().setHTML(`Vehicle ${vehicle.id}
Status: ${vehicle.status}`)) .addTo(map); }); } function getVehicleColor(status) { switch (status) { case 'active': return '#22c55e'; case 'maintenance': return '#eab308'; case 'inactive': return '#ef4444'; default: return '#3b82f6'; } } function setupDarkModeToggle() { const darkModeToggle = document.getElementById('dark-mode-toggle'); const body = document.body; darkModeToggle.addEventListener('click', () => { body.classList.toggle('dark-mode'); localStorage.setItem('darkMode', body.classList.contains('dark-mode')); darkModeToggle.textContent = body.classList.contains('dark-mode') ? '🌞' : '🌓'; }); if (localStorage.getItem('darkMode') === 'true') { body.classList.add('dark-mode'); darkModeToggle.textContent = '🌞'; } } function setupAPIInteraction() { const apiCategorySelect = document.getElementById('api-category-select'); const apiEndpointSelect = document.getElementById('api-endpoint-select'); const optionalParameters = document.getElementById('optional-parameters'); const accessTokenInput = document.getElementById('access-token'); const generateTestTokenBtn = document.getElementById('generate-test-token-btn'); const tryExampleBtn = document.getElementById('try-example-btn'); const sendRequestBtn = document.getElementById('send-request-btn'); const requestUrl = document.getElementById('request-url'); const responseBody = document.getElementById('response-body'); const loadingSpinner = document.getElementById('loading-spinner'); apiCategorySelect.addEventListener('change', updateEndpoints); apiEndpointSelect.addEventListener('change', updateOptionalParameters); generateTestTokenBtn.addEventListener('click', generateTestToken); tryExampleBtn.addEventListener('click', loadExample); sendRequestBtn.addEventListener('click', sendRequest); function updateEndpoints() { const category = apiCategorySelect.value; apiEndpointSelect.innerHTML = ''; const endpoints = getEndpointsForCategory(category); endpoints.forEach(endpoint => { const option = document.createElement('option'); option.value = endpoint.value; option.textContent = endpoint.label; apiEndpointSelect.appendChild(option); }); } function getEndpointsForCategory(category) { const endpoints = { fleet: [ { value: 'get_vehicles', label: 'GET /vehicles' }, { value: 'create_vehicle', label: 'POST /vehicles' }, { value: 'update_vehicle', label: 'PUT /vehicles/{id}' }, { value: 'get_fleet_status', label: 'GET /fleet/status' } ], user: [ { value: 'get_user', label: 'GET /user' }, { value: 'create_user', label: 'POST /user' }, { value: 'update_user', label: 'PUT /user/{id}' }, { value: 'get_user_activity', label: 'GET /user/activity' } ], trip: [ { value: 'start_trip', label: 'POST /trip' }, { value: 'end_trip', label: 'PUT /trip/{id}' }, { value: 'get_trip', label: 'GET /trip/{id}' }, { value: 'list_trips', label: 'GET /trips' } ], maintenance: [ { value: 'create_maintenance_task', label: 'POST /maintenance' }, { value: 'update_maintenance_task', label: 'PUT /maintenance/{id}' }, { value: 'get_maintenance_history', label: 'GET /maintenance/history' }, { value: 'get_predictive_maintenance', label: 'GET /maintenance/predictive' } ], analytics: [ { value: 'get_usage_stats', label: 'GET /analytics/usage' }, { value: 'generate_report', label: 'POST /analytics/report' }, { value: 'get_report', label: 'GET /analytics/report/{id}' } ], payment: [ { value: 'create_invoice', label: 'POST /payment/invoice' }, { value: 'get_invoice', label: 'GET /payment/invoice/{id}' }, { value: 'process_payment', label: 'POST /payment/process' } ], location: [ { value: 'create_geofence', label: 'POST /location/geofence' }, { value: 'update_geofence', label: 'PUT /location/geofence/{id}' }, { value: 'get_geofences', label: 'GET /location/geofences' } ] }; return endpoints[category] || []; } function updateOptionalParameters() { optionalParameters.innerHTML = ''; const endpoint = apiEndpointSelect.value; const params = getParametersForEndpoint(endpoint); params.forEach(param => { const input = document.createElement('input'); input.type = 'text'; input.id = param.id; input.placeholder = param.placeholder; optionalParameters.appendChild(input); }); } function getParametersForEndpoint(endpoint) { const parameters = { update_vehicle: [ { id: 'vehicle-id', placeholder: 'Vehicle ID' }, { id: 'vehicle-status', placeholder: 'New Status' } ], create_maintenance_task: [ { id: 'vehicle-id', placeholder: 'Vehicle ID' }, { id: 'task-description', placeholder: 'Task Description' } ], // Add more parameters for other endpoints as needed }; return parameters[endpoint] || []; } function generateTestToken() { fetch('/api/v1/auth/generate-test-token', { method: 'POST', }) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { accessTokenInput.value = data.test_token; showNotification('Test API Access Token generated successfully.', 'success'); }) .catch(error => { showNotification('Failed to generate Test API Access Token.', 'error'); }); } function loadExample() { const endpoint = apiEndpointSelect.value; const exampleData = getExampleDataForEndpoint(endpoint); Object.keys(exampleData).forEach(key => { const input = document.getElementById(key); if (input) { input.value = exampleData[key]; } }); showNotification('Example data loaded.', 'info'); } function getExampleDataForEndpoint(endpoint) { const exampleData = { update_vehicle: { 'vehicle-id': '1234', 'vehicle-status': 'maintenance' }, create_maintenance_task: { 'vehicle-id': '5678', 'task-description': 'Routine oil change' }, // Add more example data for other endpoints as needed }; return exampleData[endpoint] || {}; } function sendRequest() { const endpoint = apiEndpointSelect.value; const accessToken = accessTokenInput.value; if (!endpoint || !accessToken) { showNotification('Please select an endpoint and enter an access token.', 'error'); return; } const url = getApiUrl(endpoint); const method = getApiMethod(endpoint); const body = getRequestBody(endpoint); requestUrl.textContent = `${method}: ${url}`; requestUrl.className = 'code-block'; showNotification('Sending request...', 'info'); loadingSpinner.style.display = 'block'; responseBody.style.opacity = '0.5'; fetch(url, { method: method, headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Authorization': `Bearer ${accessToken}` }, body: method !== 'GET' ? JSON.stringify(body) : undefined }) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { responseBody.textContent = JSON.stringify(data, null, 2); hljs.highlightElement(responseBody); showNotification('Request completed successfully.', 'success'); }) .catch(error => { responseBody.textContent = `Error: ${error.message}`; showNotification('An error occurred while sending the request.', 'error'); }) .finally(() => { loadingSpinner.style.display = 'none'; responseBody.style.opacity = '1'; }); } function getApiUrl(endpoint) { return `/api/v1/${endpoint.replace('_', '/')}`; } function getApiMethod(endpoint) { if (endpoint.startsWith('get')) return 'GET'; if (endpoint.startsWith('create')) return 'POST'; if (endpoint.startsWith('update')) return 'PUT'; if (endpoint.startsWith('delete')) return 'DELETE'; return 'GET'; } function getRequestBody(endpoint) { const body = {}; const params = getParametersForEndpoint(endpoint); params.forEach(param => { const input = document.getElementById(param.id); if (input && input.value) { body[param.id] = input.value; } }); return body; } } function setupHelpModal() { const modal = document.getElementById('help-modal'); const btn = document.getElementById('help-button'); const span = document.getElementsByClassName('close')[0]; btn.onclick = function() { modal.style.display = 'block'; } span.onclick = function() { modal.style.display = 'none'; } window.onclick = function(event) { if (event.target == modal) { modal.style.display = 'none'; } } } function updateDashboard() { // This function should fetch real data from your API // For now, we'll use placeholder data document.getElementById('total-vehicles').textContent = '150'; document.getElementById('active-trips').textContent = '42'; document.getElementById('maintenance-tasks').textContent = '7'; document.getElementById('revenue-today').textContent = '$3,250'; } function showNotification(message, type = 'info') { const notificationArea = document.getElementById('notification-area'); const notification = document.createElement('div'); notification.className = `notification ${type}`; notification.textContent = message; notificationArea.appendChild(notification); setTimeout(() => { notification.classList.add('show'); }, 10); setTimeout(() => { notification.classList.remove('show'); setTimeout(() => { notificationArea.removeChild(notification); }, 300); }, 3000); }

agent_memory.message:
<code_agent_thoughts>
To improve the UI/UX of the Lattis API Sandbox, we'll focus on enhancing the visual appeal and user interaction of the existing interface. Let's start by updating the CSS to create a more modern and visually appealing design. We'll modify the `static/css/style.css` file to implement these changes.
</code_agent_thoughts>
<code_agent_write_file file_path="static/css/style.css">
:root {
    --primary-color: #3a7bd5;
    --secondary-color: #00d2ff;
    --background-color: #f5f7fa;
    --text-color: #333333;
    --card-background: #ffffff;
    --border-radius: 8px;
    --box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

body {
    font-family: 'Roboto', Arial, sans-serif;
    line-height: 1.6;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    background-color: var(--background-color);
    color: var(--text-color);
}

header {
    background: linear-gradient(to right, var(--primary-color), var(--secondary-color));
    color: #ffffff;
    padding: 1rem;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-items: center;
    box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
}

header h1 {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    font-weight: 700;
}

.container {
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 2rem 1rem;
}

.panel-container {
    display: flex;
    gap: 2rem;
    margin-bottom: 2rem;
}

.left-panel, .right-panel {
    flex: 1;
    background-color: var(--card-background);
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    padding: 1.5rem;
    box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
}

.central-section {
    background-color: var(--card-background);
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    padding: 1.5rem;
    box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
    margin-bottom: 2rem;
}

select, input, button, textarea {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 0.75rem;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
    border: 1px solid #e0e0e0;
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    font-size: 1rem;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

select:focus, input:focus, textarea:focus {
    outline: none;
    border-color: var(--primary-color);
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(58, 123, 213, 0.2);
}

button {
    background: linear-gradient(to right, var(--primary-color), var(--secondary-color));
    color: #ffffff;
    border: none;
    cursor: pointer;
    font-weight: bold;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

button:hover {
    opacity: 0.9;
    transform: translateY(-2px);
}

button:active {
    transform: translateY(0);
}

.token-container {
    display: flex;
    gap: 0.5rem;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.token-container input {
    flex-grow: 1;
    margin-bottom: 0;
}

.token-container button {
    width: auto;
    white-space: nowrap;
}

details {
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
    background-color: #f0f0f0;
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    padding: 0.5rem;
}

summary {
    cursor: pointer;
    font-weight: bold;
    padding: 0.5rem;
}

#fleet-map {
    height: 400px;
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    overflow: hidden;
    box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
}

pre {
    background-color: #f4f4f4;
    padding: 1rem;
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    overflow-x: auto;
    font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.response-container {
    position: relative;
}

.spinner {
    display: none;
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
    width: 50px;
    height: 50px;
    border: 5px solid #f3f3f3;
    border-top: 5px solid var(--primary-color);
    border-radius: 50%;
    animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes spin {
    0% { transform: translate(-50%, -50%) rotate(0deg); }
    100% { transform: translate(-50%, -50%) rotate(360deg); }
}

#notification-area {
    position: fixed;
    top: 1rem;
    right: 1rem;
    z-index: 1000;
}

.notification {
    background-color: #4CAF50;
    color: white;
    padding: 1rem;
    margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
    opacity: 0;
    transition: opacity 0.3s ease-in-out;
}

.notification.show {
    opacity: 1;
}

.dashboard-section {
    margin-top: 2rem;
}

.dashboard-grid {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(200px, 1fr));
    gap: 1rem;
}

.dashboard-card {
    background-color: var(--card-background);
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    padding: 1rem;
    box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
    text-align: center;
}

.dashboard-card h3 {
    margin-top: 0;
    color: var(--primary-color);
}

.dashboard-card p {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    font-weight: bold;
    margin: 0;
}

.modal {
    display: none;
    position: fixed;
    z-index: 1000;
    left: 0;
    top: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.4);
}

.modal-content {
    background-color: var(--card-background);
    margin: 15% auto;
    padding: 2rem;
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
    width: 80%;
    max-width: 600px;
}

.close {
    color: #aaa;
    float: right;
    font-size: 28px;
    font-weight: bold;
    cursor: pointer;
}

.close:hover,
.close:focus {
    color: #000;
    text-decoration: none;
    cursor: pointer;
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
    .panel-container {
        flex-direction: column;
    }

    .left-panel, .right-panel {
        width: 100%;
    }
}

/* Dark mode styles */
body.dark-mode {
    --background-color: #1a1a1a;
    --text-color: #f4f4f4;
    --card-background: #2c2c2c;
}

body.dark-mode header {
    background: linear-gradient(to right, #1a1a1a, #2c2c2c);
}

body.dark-mode pre {
    background-color: #3a3a3a;
    color: #f4f4f4;
}

body.dark-mode #advanced-options,
body.dark-mode #batch-options {
    background-color: #3a3a3a;
}

body.dark-mode .notification {
    background-color: #2c3e50;
}
</code_agent_write_file>

agent_memory.message:
<code_agent_thoughts>
To improve the UI/UX of the Lattis API Sandbox, we'll focus on enhancing the visual appeal and user interaction of the existing interface. Let's start by updating the CSS to create a more modern and visually appealing design. We'll modify the `static/css/style.css` file to implement these changes.
</code_agent_thoughts>
<code_agent_write_file file_path="static/css/style.css">
:root {
    --primary-color: #3a7bd5;
    --secondary-color: #00d2ff;
    --background-color: #f5f7fa;
    --text-color: #333333;
    --card-background: #ffffff;
    --border-radius: 8px;
    --box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

body {
    font-family: 'Roboto', Arial, sans-serif;
    line-height: 1.6;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    background-color: var(--background-color);
    color: var(--text-color);
}

header {
    background: linear-gradient(to right, var(--primary-color), var(--secondary-color));
    color: #ffffff;
    padding: 1rem;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-items: center;
    box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
}

header h1 {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    font-weight: 700;
}

.container {
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 2rem 1rem;
}

.panel-container {
    display: flex;
    gap: 2rem;
    margin-bottom: 2rem;
}

.left-panel, .right-panel {
    flex: 1;
    background-color: var(--card-background);
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    padding: 1.5rem;
    box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
}

.central-section {
    background-color: var(--card-background);
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    padding: 1.5rem;
    box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
    margin-bottom: 2rem;
}

select, input, button, textarea {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 0.75rem;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
    border: 1px solid #e0e0e0;
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    font-size: 1rem;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

select:focus, input:focus, textarea:focus {
    outline: none;
    border-color: var(--primary-color);
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(58, 123, 213, 0.2);
}

button {
    background: linear-gradient(to right, var(--primary-color), var(--secondary-color));
    color: #ffffff;
    border: none;
    cursor: pointer;
    font-weight: bold;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

button:hover {
    opacity: 0.9;
    transform: translateY(-2px);
}

button:active {
    transform: translateY(0);
}

.token-container {
    display: flex;
    gap: 0.5rem;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.token-container input {
    flex-grow: 1;
    margin-bottom: 0;
}

.token-container button {
    width: auto;
    white-space: nowrap;
}

details {
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
    background-color: #f0f0f0;
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    padding: 0.5rem;
}

summary {
    cursor: pointer;
    font-weight: bold;
    padding: 0.5rem;
}

#fleet-map {
    height: 400px;
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    overflow: hidden;
    box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
}

pre {
    background-color: #f4f4f4;
    padding: 1rem;
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    overflow-x: auto;
    font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.response-container {
    position: relative;
}

.spinner {
    display: none;
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
    width: 50px;
    height: 50px;
    border: 5px solid #f3f3f3;
    border-top: 5px solid var(--primary-color);
    border-radius: 50%;
    animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes spin {
    0% { transform: translate(-50%, -50%) rotate(0deg); }
    100% { transform: translate(-50%, -50%) rotate(360deg); }
}

#notification-area {
    position: fixed;
    top: 1rem;
    right: 1rem;
    z-index: 1000;
}

.notification {
    background-color: #4CAF50;
    color: white;
    padding: 1rem;
    margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
    opacity: 0;
    transition: opacity 0.3s ease-in-out;
}

.notification.show {
    opacity: 1;
}

.dashboard-section {
    margin-top: 2rem;
}

.dashboard-grid {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(200px, 1fr));
    gap: 1rem;
}

.dashboard-card {
    background-color: var(--card-background);
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    padding: 1rem;
    box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
    text-align: center;
}

.dashboard-card h3 {
    margin-top: 0;
    color: var(--primary-color);
}

.dashboard-card p {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    font-weight: bold;
    margin: 0;
}

.modal {
    display: none;
    position: fixed;
    z-index: 1000;
    left: 0;
    top: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.4);
}

.modal-content {
    background-color: var(--card-background);
    margin: 15% auto;
    padding: 2rem;
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
    width: 80%;
    max-width: 600px;
}

.close {
    color: #aaa;
    float: right;
    font-size: 28px;
    font-weight: bold;
    cursor: pointer;
}

.close:hover,
.close:focus {
    color: #000;
    text-decoration: none;
    cursor: pointer;
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
    .panel-container {
        flex-direction: column;
    }

    .left-panel, .right-panel {
        width: 100%;
    }
}

/* Dark mode styles */
body.dark-mode {
    --background-color: #1a1a1a;
    --text-color: #f4f4f4;
    --card-background: #2c2c2c;
}

body.dark-mode header {
    background: linear-gradient(to right, #1a1a1a, #2c2c2c);
}

body.dark-mode pre {
    background-color: #3a3a3a;
    color: #f4f4f4;
}

body.dark-mode #advanced-options,
body.dark-mode #batch-options {
    background-color: #3a3a3a;
}

body.dark-mode .notification {
    background-color: #2c3e50;
}
</code_agent_write_file>

}

body {
    font-family: 'Roboto', Arial, sans-serif;
    line-height: 1.6;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    background-color: var(--background-color);
    color: var(--text-color);
}

header {
    background: linear-gradient(to right, var(--primary-color), var(--secondary-color));
    color: #ffffff;
    padding: 1rem;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-items: center;
    box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
}

header h1 {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    font-weight: 700;
}

.container {
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 2rem 1rem;
}

.panel-container {
    display: flex;
    gap: 2rem;
    margin-bottom: 2rem;
}

.left-panel, .right-panel {
    flex: 1;
    background-color: var(--card-background);
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    padding: 1.5rem;
    box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
}

.central-section {
    background-color: var(--card-background);
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    padding: 1.5rem;
    box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
    margin-bottom: 2rem;
}

select, input, button, textarea {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 0.75rem;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
    border: 1px solid #e0e0e0;
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    font-size: 1rem;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

select:focus, input:focus, textarea:focus {
    outline: none;
    border-color: var(--primary-color);
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(58, 123, 213, 0.2);
}

button {
    background: linear-gradient(to right, var(--primary-color), var(--secondary-color));
    color: #ffffff;
    border: none;
    cursor: pointer;
    font-weight: bold;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

button:hover {
    opacity: 0.9;
    transform: translateY(-2px);
}

button:active {
    transform: translateY(0);
}

.token-container {
    display: flex;
    gap: 0.5rem;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.token-container input {
    flex-grow: 1;
    margin-bottom: 0;
}

.token-container button {
    width: auto;
    white-space: nowrap;
}

details {
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
    background-color: #f0f0f0;
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    padding: 0.5rem;
}

summary {
    cursor: pointer;
    font-weight: bold;
    padding: 0.5rem;
}

#fleet-map {
    height: 400px;
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    overflow: hidden;
    box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
}

pre {
    background-color: #f4f4f4;
    padding: 1rem;
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    overflow-x: auto;
    font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.response-container {
    position: relative;
}

.spinner {
    display: none;
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
    width: 50px;
    height: 50px;
    border: 5px solid #f3f3f3;
    border-top: 5px solid var(--primary-color);
    border-radius: 50%;
    animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes spin {
    0% { transform: translate(-50%, -50%) rotate(0deg); }
    100% { transform: translate(-50%, -50%) rotate(360deg); }
}

#notification-area {
    position: fixed;
    top: 1rem;
    right: 1rem;
    z-index: 1000;
}

.notification {
    background-color: #4CAF50;
    color: white;
    padding: 1rem;
    margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
    opacity: 0;
    transition: opacity 0.3s ease-in-out;
}

.notification.show {
    opacity: 1;
}

.dashboard-section {
    margin-top: 2rem;
}

.dashboard-grid {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(200px, 1fr));
    gap: 1rem;
}

.dashboard-card {
    background-color: var(--card-background);
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    padding: 1rem;
    box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
    text-align: center;
}

.dashboard-card h3 {
    margin-top: 0;
    color: var(--primary-color);
}

.dashboard-card p {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    font-weight: bold;
    margin: 0;
}

.modal {
    display: none;
    position: fixed;
    z-index: 1000;
    left: 0;
    top: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.4);
}

.modal-content {
    background-color: var(--card-background);
    margin: 15% auto;
    padding: 2rem;
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
    width: 80%;
    max-width: 600px;
}

.close {
    color: #aaa;
    float: right;
    font-size: 28px;
    font-weight: bold;
    cursor: pointer;
}

.close:hover,
.close:focus {
    color: #000;
    text-decoration: none;
    cursor: pointer;
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
    .panel-container {
        flex-direction: column;
    }

    .left-panel, .right-panel {
        width: 100%;
    }
}

/* Dark mode styles */
body.dark-mode {
    --background-color: #1a1a1a;
    --text-color: #f4f4f4;
    --card-background: #2c2c2c;
}

body.dark-mode header {
    background: linear-gradient(to right, #1a1a1a, #2c2c2c);
}

body.dark-mode pre {
    background-color: #3a3a3a;
    color: #f4f4f4;
}

body.dark-mode #advanced-options,
body.dark-mode #batch-options {
    background-color: #3a3a3a;
}

body.dark-mode .notification {
    background-color: #2c3e50;
}

/* Improved accessibility */
.visually-hidden {
    position: absolute;
    width: 1px;
    height: 1px;
    margin: -1px;
    padding: 0;
    overflow: hidden;
    clip: rect(0, 0, 0, 0);
    white-space: nowrap;
    border: 0;
}

/* Improved focus styles */
*:focus {
    outline: 2px solid var(--primary-color);
    outline-offset: 2px;
}

/* Improved button styles */
.icon-button {
    background: none;
    border: none;
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    cursor: pointer;
    padding: 0.5rem;
    border-radius: 50%;
    transition: background-color 0.3s ease;
}

.icon-button:hover {
    background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
}

/* Improved form styles */
label {
    display: block;
    margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
    font-weight: bold;
}

/* Improved code block styles */
.code-block {
    background-color: #f4f4f4;
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    padding: 1rem;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
    font-family: monospace;
    white-space: pre-wrap;
    word-break: break-all;
}

body.dark-mode .code-block {
    background-color: #2c2c2c;
    color: #f4f4f4;
}
</code_agent_write_file>

Now that we've updated both the CSS and HTML, let's enhance the JavaScript to improve user interaction and add some new features. We'll modify the `static/js/main.js` file to implement these changes. document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => { initializeMap(); setupDarkModeToggle(); setupAPIInteraction(); setupHelpModal(); updateDashboard(); }); function initializeMap() { mapboxgl.accessToken = MAPBOX_ACCESS_TOKEN; const map = new mapboxgl.Map({ container: 'fleet-map', style: 'mapbox://styles/mapbox/streets-v11', center: [-122.4194, 37.7749], zoom: 12 }); // Add markers for sample vehicles const vehicles = [ { id: 1, coordinates: [-122.4194, 37.7749], status: 'active' }, { id: 2, coordinates: [-122.4099, 37.7850], status: 'maintenance' }, { id: 3, coordinates: [-122.4289, 37.7648], status: 'inactive' }, ]; vehicles.forEach(vehicle => { const el = document.createElement('div'); el.className = 'vehicle-marker'; el.style.backgroundColor = getVehicleColor(vehicle.status); el.style.width = '20px'; el.style.height = '20px'; el.style.borderRadius = '50%'; el.style.border = '2px solid white'; new mapboxgl.Marker(el) .setLngLat(vehicle.coordinates) .setPopup(new mapboxgl.Popup().setHTML(`Vehicle ${vehicle.id}
Status: ${vehicle.status}`)) .addTo(map); }); // Add zoom and rotation controls map.addControl(new mapboxgl.NavigationControl()); // Add fullscreen control map.addControl(new mapboxgl.FullscreenControl()); } function getVehicleColor(status) { switch (status) { case 'active': return '#22c55e'; case 'maintenance': return '#eab308'; case 'inactive': return '#ef4444'; default: return '#3b82f6'; } } function setupDarkModeToggle() { const darkModeToggle = document.getElementById('dark-mode-toggle'); const body = document.body; darkModeToggle.addEventListener('click', () => { body.classList.toggle('dark-mode'); localStorage.setItem('darkMode', body.classList.contains('dark-mode')); darkModeToggle.textContent = body.classList.contains('dark-mode') ? '🌞' : '🌓'; darkModeToggle.setAttribute('aria-label', body.classList.contains('dark-mode') ? 'Switch to Light Mode' : 'Switch to Dark Mode'); }); if (localStorage.getItem('darkMode') === 'true') { body.classList.add('dark-mode'); darkModeToggle.textContent = '🌞'; darkModeToggle.setAttribute('aria-label', 'Switch to Light Mode'); } } function setupAPIInteraction() { const apiCategorySelect = document.getElementById('api-category-select'); const apiEndpointSelect = document.getElementById('api-endpoint-select'); const optionalParameters = document.getElementById('optional-parameters'); const accessTokenInput = document.getElementById('access-token'); const generateTestTokenBtn = document.getElementById('generate-test-token-btn'); const tryExampleBtn = document.getElementById('try-example-btn'); const sendRequestBtn = document.getElementById('send-request-btn'); const requestUrl = document.getElementById('request-url'); const responseBody = document.getElementById('response-body'); const loadingSpinner = document.getElementById('loading-spinner'); apiCategorySelect.addEventListener('change', updateEndpoints); apiEndpointSelect.addEventListener('change', updateOptionalParameters); generateTestTokenBtn.addEventListener('click', generateTestToken); tryExampleBtn.addEventListener('click', loadExample); sendRequestBtn.addEventListener('click', sendRequest); function updateEndpoints() { const category = apiCategorySelect.value; apiEndpointSelect.innerHTML = ''; const endpoints = getEndpointsForCategory(category); endpoints.forEach(endpoint => { const option = document.createElement('option'); option.value = endpoint.value; option.textContent = endpoint.label; apiEndpointSelect.appendChild(option); }); } function getEndpointsForCategory(category) { const endpoints = { fleet: [ { value: 'get_vehicles', label: 'GET /vehicles' }, { value: 'create_vehicle', label: 'POST /vehicles' }, { value: 'update_vehicle', label: 'PUT /vehicles/{id}' }, { value: 'get_fleet_status', label: 'GET /fleet/status' } ], user: [ { value: 'get_user', label: 'GET /user' }, { value: 'create_user', label: 'POST /user' }, { value: 'update_user', label: 'PUT /user/{id}' }, { value: 'get_user_activity', label: 'GET /user/activity' } ], trip: [ { value: 'start_trip', label: 'POST /trip' }, { value: 'end_trip', label: 'PUT /trip/{id}' }, { value: 'get_trip', label: 'GET /trip/{id}' }, { value: 'list_trips', label: 'GET /trips' } ], maintenance: [ { value: 'create_maintenance_task', label: 'POST /maintenance' }, { value: 'update_maintenance_task', label: 'PUT /maintenance/{id}' }, { value: 'get_maintenance_history', label: 'GET /maintenance/history' }, { value: 'get_predictive_maintenance', label: 'GET /maintenance/predictive' } ], analytics: [ { value: 'get_usage_stats', label: 'GET /analytics/usage' }, { value: 'generate_report', label: 'POST /analytics/report' }, { value: 'get_report', label: 'GET /analytics/report/{id}' } ], payment: [ { value: 'create_invoice', label: 'POST /payment/invoice' }, { value: 'get_invoice', label: 'GET /payment/invoice/{id}' }, { value: 'process_payment', label: 'POST /payment/process' } ], location: [ { value: 'create_geofence', label: 'POST /location/geofence' }, { value: 'update_geofence', label: 'PUT /location/geofence/{id}' }, { value: 'get_geofences', label: 'GET /location/geofences' } ] }; return endpoints[category] || []; } function updateOptionalParameters() { optionalParameters.innerHTML = ''; const endpoint = apiEndpointSelect.value; const params = getParametersForEndpoint(endpoint); params.forEach(param => { const label = document.createElement('label'); label.textContent = param.label; label.setAttribute('for', param.id); const input = document.createElement('input'); input.type = 'text'; input.id = param.id; input.placeholder = param.placeholder; optionalParameters.appendChild(label); optionalParameters.appendChild(input); }); } function getParametersForEndpoint(endpoint) { const parameters = { update_vehicle: [ { id: 'vehicle-id', label: 'Vehicle ID:', placeholder: 'Enter Vehicle ID' }, { id: 'vehicle-status', label: 'New Status:', placeholder: 'Enter new status' } ], create_maintenance_task: [ { id: 'vehicle-id', label: 'Vehicle ID:', placeholder: 'Enter Vehicle ID' }, { id: 'task-description', label: 'Task Description:', placeholder: 'Enter task description' } ], // Add more parameters for other endpoints as needed }; return parameters[endpoint] || []; } function generateTestToken() { fetch('/api/v1/auth/generate-test-token', { method: 'POST', }) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { accessTokenInput.value = data.test_token; showNotification('Test API Access Token generated successfully.', 'success'); }) .catch(error => { showNotification('Failed to generate Test API Access Token.', 'error'); }); } function loadExample() { const endpoint = apiEndpointSelect.value; const exampleData = getExampleDataForEndpoint(endpoint); Object.keys(exampleData).forEach(key => { const input = document.getElementById(key); if (input) { input.value = exampleData[key]; } }); showNotification('Example data loaded.', 'info'); } function getExampleDataForEndpoint(endpoint) { const exampleData = { update_vehicle: { 'vehicle-id': '1234', 'vehicle-status': 'maintenance' }, create_maintenance_task: { 'vehicle-id': '5678', 'task-description': 'Routine oil change' }, // Add more example data for other endpoints as needed }; return exampleData[endpoint] || {}; } function sendRequest() { const endpoint = apiEndpointSelect.value; const accessToken = accessTokenInput.value; if (!endpoint || !accessToken) { showNotification('Please select an endpoint and enter an access token.', 'error'); return; } const url = getApiUrl(endpoint); const method = getApiMethod(endpoint); const body = getRequestBody(endpoint); requestUrl.textContent = `${method}: ${url}`; requestUrl.className = 'code-block'; showNotification('Sending request...', 'info'); loadingSpinner.style.display = 'block'; responseBody.style.opacity = '0.5'; fetch(url, { method: method, headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Authorization': `Bearer ${accessToken}` }, body: method !== 'GET' ? JSON.stringify(body) : undefined }) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { responseBody.textContent = JSON.stringify(data, null, 2); hljs.highlightElement(responseBody); showNotification('Request completed successfully.', 'success'); }) .catch(error => { responseBody.textContent = `Error: ${error.message}`; showNotification('An error occurred while sending the request.', 'error'); }) .finally(() => { loadingSpinner.style.display = 'none'; responseBody.style.opacity = '1'; }); } function getApiUrl(endpoint) { return `/api/v1/${endpoint.replace('_', '/')}`; } function getApiMethod(endpoint) { if (endpoint.startsWith('get')) return 'GET'; if (endpoint.startsWith('create')) return 'POST'; if (endpoint.startsWith('update')) return 'PUT'; if (endpoint.startsWith('delete')) return 'DELETE'; return 'GET'; } function getRequestBody(endpoint) { const body = {}; const params = getParametersForEndpoint(endpoint); params.forEach(param => { const input = document.getElementById(param.id); if (input && input.value) { body[param.id] = input.value; } }); return body; } } function setupHelpModal() { const modal = document.getElementById('help-modal'); const btn = document.getElementById('help-button'); const closeBtn = modal.querySelector('.close'); btn.onclick = function() { modal.style.display = 'block'; modal.setAttribute('aria-hidden', 'false'); } closeBtn.onclick = function() { modal.style.display = 'none'; modal.setAttribute('aria-hidden', 'true'); } window.onclick = function(event) { if (event.target == modal) { modal.style.display = 'none'; modal.setAttribute('aria-hidden', 'true'); } } } function updateDashboard() { // This function should fetch real data from your API // For now, we'll use placeholder data document.getElementById('total-vehicles').textContent = '150'; document.getElementById('active-trips').textContent = '42'; document.getElementById('maintenance-tasks').textContent = '7'; document.getElementById('revenue-today').textContent = '$3,250'; } function showNotification(message, type = 'info') { const notificationArea = document.getElementById('notification-area'); const notification = document.createElement('div'); notification.className = `notification ${type}`; notification.textContent = message; notification.setAttribute('role', 'alert'); notificationArea.appendChild(notification); setTimeout(() => { notification.classList.add('show'); }, 10); setTimeout(() => { notification.classList.remove('show'); setTimeout(() => { notificationArea.removeChild(notification); }, 300); }, 3000); }

.close:hover,

    color: #000;
    text-decoration: none;
    cursor: pointer;
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
    .panel-container {
        flex-direction: column;
    }

    .left-panel, .right-panel {
        width: 100%;
    }
}

/* Dark mode styles */
body.dark-mode {
    --background-color: #1a1a1a;
    --text-color: #f4f4f4;
    --card-background: #2c2c2c;
}

body.dark-mode header {
    background: linear-gradient(to right, #1a1a1a, #2c2c2c);
}

body.dark-mode pre {
    background-color: #3a3a3a;
    color: #f4f4f4;
}

body.dark-mode #advanced-options,
body.dark-mode #batch-options {
    background-color: #3a3a3a;
}

body.dark-mode .notification {
    background-color: #2c3e50;
}

/* Improved accessibility */
.visually-hidden {
    position: absolute;
    width: 1px;
    height: 1px;
    margin: -1px;
    padding: 0;
    overflow: hidden;
    clip: rect(0, 0, 0, 0);
    white-space: nowrap;
    border: 0;
}

/* Improved focus styles */
*:focus {
    outline: 2px solid var(--primary-color);
    outline-offset: 2px;
}

/* Improved button styles */
.icon-button {
    background: none;
    border: none;
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    cursor: pointer;
    padding: 0.5rem;
    border-radius: 50%;
    transition: background-color 0.3s ease;
}

.icon-button:hover {
    background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
}

/* Improved form styles */
label {
    display: block;
    margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
    font-weight: bold;
}

/* Improved code block styles */
.code-block {
    background-color: #f4f4f4;
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    padding: 1rem;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
    font-family: monospace;
    white-space: pre-wrap;
    word-break: break-all;
}

body.dark-mode .code-block {
    background-color: #2c2c2c;
    color: #f4f4f4;
}
</code_agent_write_file>

We'll modify the `static/js/main.js` file to implement these changes. document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => { initializeMap(); setupDarkModeToggle(); setupAPIInteraction(); setupHelpModal(); updateDashboard(); }); function initializeMap() { mapboxgl.accessToken = MAPBOX_ACCESS_TOKEN; const map = new mapboxgl.Map({ container: 'fleet-map', style: 'mapbox://styles/mapbox/streets-v11', center: [-122.4194, 37.7749], zoom: 12 }); // Add markers for sample vehicles const vehicles = [ { id: 1, coordinates: [-122.4194, 37.7749], status: 'active' }, { id: 2, coordinates: [-122.4099, 37.7850], status: 'maintenance' }, { id: 3, coordinates: [-122.4289, 37.7648], status: 'inactive' }, ]; vehicles.forEach(vehicle => { const el = document.createElement('div'); el.className = 'vehicle-marker'; el.style.backgroundColor = getVehicleColor(vehicle.status); el.style.width = '20px'; el.style.height = '20px'; el.style.borderRadius = '50%'; el.style.border = '2px solid white'; new mapboxgl.Marker(el) .setLngLat(vehicle.coordinates) .setPopup(new mapboxgl.Popup().setHTML(`Vehicle ${vehicle.id}
Status: ${vehicle.status}`)) .addTo(map); }); // Add zoom and rotation controls map.addControl(new mapboxgl.NavigationControl()); // Add fullscreen control map.addControl(new mapboxgl.FullscreenControl()); } function getVehicleColor(status) { switch (status) { case 'active': return '#22c55e'; case 'maintenance': return '#eab308'; case 'inactive': return '#ef4444'; default: return '#3b82f6'; } } function setupDarkModeToggle() { const darkModeToggle = document.getElementById('dark-mode-toggle'); const body = document.body; darkModeToggle.addEventListener('click', () => { body.classList.toggle('dark-mode'); localStorage.setItem('darkMode', body.classList.contains('dark-mode')); darkModeToggle.textContent = body.classList.contains('dark-mode') ? '🌞' : '🌓'; darkModeToggle.setAttribute('aria-label', body.classList.contains('dark-mode') ? 'Switch to Light Mode' : 'Switch to Dark Mode'); }); if (localStorage.getItem('darkMode') === 'true') { body.classList.add('dark-mode'); darkModeToggle.textContent = '🌞'; darkModeToggle.setAttribute('aria-label', 'Switch to Light Mode'); } } function setupAPIInteraction() { const apiCategorySelect = document.getElementById('api-category-select'); const apiEndpointSelect = document.getElementById('api-endpoint-select'); const optionalParameters = document.getElementById('optional-parameters'); const accessTokenInput = document.getElementById('access-token'); const generateTestTokenBtn = document.getElementById('generate-test-token-btn'); const tryExampleBtn = document.getElementById('try-example-btn'); const sendRequestBtn = document.getElementById('send-request-btn'); const requestUrl = document.getElementById('request-url'); const responseBody = document.getElementById('response-body'); const loadingSpinner = document.getElementById('loading-spinner'); apiCategorySelect.addEventListener('change', updateEndpoints); apiEndpointSelect.addEventListener('change', updateOptionalParameters); generateTestTokenBtn.addEventListener('click', generateTestToken); tryExampleBtn.addEventListener('click', loadExample); sendRequestBtn.addEventListener('click', sendRequest); function updateEndpoints() { const category = apiCategorySelect.value; apiEndpointSelect.innerHTML = ''; const endpoints = getEndpointsForCategory(category); endpoints.forEach(endpoint => { const option = document.createElement('option'); option.value = endpoint.value; option.textContent = endpoint.label; apiEndpointSelect.appendChild(option); }); } function getEndpointsForCategory(category) { const endpoints = { fleet: [ { value: 'get_vehicles', label: 'GET /vehicles' }, { value: 'create_vehicle', label: 'POST /vehicles' }, { value: 'update_vehicle', label: 'PUT /vehicles/{id}' }, { value: 'get_fleet_status', label: 'GET /fleet/status' } ], user: [ { value: 'get_user', label: 'GET /user' }, { value: 'create_user', label: 'POST /user' }, { value: 'update_user', label: 'PUT /user/{id}' }, { value: 'get_user_activity', label: 'GET /user/activity' } ], trip: [ { value: 'start_trip', label: 'POST /trip' }, { value: 'end_trip', label: 'PUT /trip/{id}' }, { value: 'get_trip', label: 'GET /trip/{id}' }, { value: 'list_trips', label: 'GET /trips' } ], maintenance: [ { value: 'create_maintenance_task', label: 'POST /maintenance' }, { value: 'update_maintenance_task', label: 'PUT /maintenance/{id}' }, { value: 'get_maintenance_history', label: 'GET /maintenance/history' }, { value: 'get_predictive_maintenance', label: 'GET /maintenance/predictive' } ], analytics: [ { value: 'get_usage_stats', label: 'GET /analytics/usage' }, { value: 'generate_report', label: 'POST /analytics/report' }, { value: 'get_report', label: 'GET /analytics/report/{id}' } ], payment: [ { value: 'create_invoice', label: 'POST /payment/invoice' }, { value: 'get_invoice', label: 'GET /payment/invoice/{id}' }, { value: 'process_payment', label: 'POST /payment/process' } ], location: [ { value: 'create_geofence', label: 'POST /location/geofence' }, { value: 'update_geofence', label: 'PUT /location/geofence/{id}' }, { value: 'get_geofences', label: 'GET /location/geofences' } ] }; return endpoints[category] || []; } function updateOptionalParameters() { optionalParameters.innerHTML = ''; const endpoint = apiEndpointSelect.value; const params = getParametersForEndpoint(endpoint); params.forEach(param => { const label = document.createElement('label'); label.textContent = param.label; label.setAttribute('for', param.id); const input = document.createElement('input'); input.type = 'text'; input.id = param.id; input.placeholder = param.placeholder; optionalParameters.appendChild(label); optionalParameters.appendChild(input); }); } function getParametersForEndpoint(endpoint) { const parameters = { update_vehicle: [ { id: 'vehicle-id', label: 'Vehicle ID:', placeholder: 'Enter Vehicle ID' }, { id: 'vehicle-status', label: 'New Status:', placeholder: 'Enter new status' } ], create_maintenance_task: [ { id: 'vehicle-id', label: 'Vehicle ID:', placeholder: 'Enter Vehicle ID' }, { id: 'task-description', label: 'Task Description:', placeholder: 'Enter task description' } ], // Add more parameters for other endpoints as needed }; return parameters[endpoint] || []; } function generateTestToken() { fetch('/api/v1/auth/generate-test-token', { method: 'POST', }) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { accessTokenInput.value = data.test_token; showNotification('Test API Access Token generated successfully.', 'success'); }) .catch(error => { showNotification('Failed to generate Test API Access Token.', 'error'); }); } function loadExample() { const endpoint = apiEndpointSelect.value; const exampleData = getExampleDataForEndpoint(endpoint); Object.keys(exampleData).forEach(key => { const input = document.getElementById(key); if (input) { input.value = exampleData[key]; } }); showNotification('Example data loaded.', 'info'); } function getExampleDataForEndpoint(endpoint) { const exampleData = { update_vehicle: { 'vehicle-id': '1234', 'vehicle-status': 'maintenance' }, create_maintenance_task: { 'vehicle-id': '5678', 'task-description': 'Routine oil change' }, // Add more example data for other endpoints as needed }; return exampleData[endpoint] || {}; } function sendRequest() { const endpoint = apiEndpointSelect.value; const accessToken = accessTokenInput.value; if (!endpoint || !accessToken) { showNotification('Please select an endpoint and enter an access token.', 'error'); return; } const url = getApiUrl(endpoint); const method = getApiMethod(endpoint); const body = getRequestBody(endpoint); requestUrl.textContent = `${method}: ${url}`; requestUrl.className = 'code-block'; showNotification('Sending request...', 'info'); loadingSpinner.style.display = 'block'; responseBody.style.opacity = '0.5'; fetch(url, { method: method, headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Authorization': `Bearer ${accessToken}` }, body: method !== 'GET' ? JSON.stringify(body) : undefined }) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { responseBody.textContent = JSON.stringify(data, null, 2); hljs.highlightElement(responseBody); showNotification('Request completed successfully.', 'success'); }) .catch(error => { responseBody.textContent = `Error: ${error.message}`; showNotification('An error occurred while sending the request.', 'error'); }) .finally(() => { loadingSpinner.style.display = 'none'; responseBody.style.opacity = '1'; }); } function getApiUrl(endpoint) { return `/api/v1/${endpoint.replace('_', '/')}`; } function getApiMethod(endpoint) { if (endpoint.startsWith('get')) return 'GET'; if (endpoint.startsWith('create')) return 'POST'; if (endpoint.startsWith('update')) return 'PUT'; if (endpoint.startsWith('delete')) return 'DELETE'; return 'GET'; } function getRequestBody(endpoint) { const body = {}; const params = getParametersForEndpoint(endpoint); params.forEach(param => { const input = document.getElementById(param.id); if (input && input.value) { body[param.id] = input.value; } }); return body; } } function setupHelpModal() { const modal = document.getElementById('help-modal'); const btn = document.getElementById('help-button'); const closeBtn = modal.querySelector('.close'); btn.onclick = function() { modal.style.display = 'block'; modal.setAttribute('aria-hidden', 'false'); } closeBtn.onclick = function() { modal.style.display = 'none'; modal.setAttribute('aria-hidden', 'true'); } window.onclick = function(event) { if (event.target == modal) { modal.style.display = 'none'; modal.setAttribute('aria-hidden', 'true'); } } } function updateDashboard() { // This function should fetch real data from your API // For now, we'll use placeholder data document.getElementById('total-vehicles').textContent = '150'; document.getElementById('active-trips').textContent = '42'; document.getElementById('maintenance-tasks').textContent = '7'; document.getElementById('revenue-today').textContent = '$3,250'; } function showNotification(message, type = 'info') { const notificationArea = document.getElementById('notification-area'); const notification = document.createElement('div'); notification.className = `notification ${type}`; notification.textContent = message; notification.setAttribute('role', 'alert'); notificationArea.appendChild(notification); setTimeout(() => { notification.classList.add('show'); }, 10); setTimeout(() => { notification.classList.remove('show'); setTimeout(() => { notificationArea.removeChild(notification); }, 300); }, 3000); }

<code_agent_thoughts>
To improve the UI/UX of the Lattis API Sandbox, we'll focus on enhancing the visual appeal and user interaction. Let's start by updating the CSS to create a more modern and visually appealing design. We'll modify the `static/css/style.css` file to implement these changes.
</code_agent_thoughts>
<code_agent_write_file file_path="static/css/style.css">
:root {
    --primary-color: #3a7bd5;
    --secondary-color: #00d2ff;
    --background-color: #f5f7fa;
    --text-color: #333333;
    --card-background: #ffffff;
    --border-radius: 8px;
    --box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

body {
    font-family: 'Roboto', Arial, sans-serif;
    line-height: 1.6;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    background-color: var(--background-color);
    color: var(--text-color);
}

header {
    background: linear-gradient(to right, var(--primary-color), var(--secondary-color));
    color: #ffffff;
    padding: 1rem;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-items: center;
    box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
}

header h1 {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    font-weight: 700;
}

.container {
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 2rem 1rem;
}

.panel-container {
    display: flex;
    gap: 2rem;
    margin-bottom: 2rem;
}

.left-panel, .right-panel {
    flex: 1;
    background-color: var(--card-background);
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    padding: 1.5rem;
    box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
}

.central-section {
    background-color: var(--card-background);
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    padding: 1.5rem;
    box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
    margin-bottom: 2rem;
}

select, input, button, textarea {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 0.75rem;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
    border: 1px solid #e0e0e0;
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    font-size: 1rem;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

select:focus, input:focus, textarea:focus {
    outline: none;
    border-color: var(--primary-color);
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(58, 123, 213, 0.2);
}

button {
    background: linear-gradient(to right, var(--primary-color), var(--secondary-color));
    color: #ffffff;
    border: none;
    cursor: pointer;
    font-weight: bold;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

button:hover {
    opacity: 0.9;
    transform: translateY(-2px);
}

button:active {
    transform: translateY(0);
}

.token-container {
    display: flex;
    gap: 0.5rem;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.token-container input {
    flex-grow: 1;
    margin-bottom: 0;
}

.token-container button {
    width: auto;
    white-space: nowrap;
}

details {
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
    background-color: #f0f0f0;
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    padding: 0.5rem;
}

summary {
    cursor: pointer;
    font-weight: bold;
    padding: 0.5rem;
}

#fleet-map {
    height: 400px;
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    overflow: hidden;
    box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
}

pre {
    background-color: #f4f4f4;
    padding: 1rem;
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    overflow-x: auto;
    font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.response-container {
    position: relative;
}

.spinner {
    display: none;
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
    width: 50px;
    height: 50px;
    border: 5px solid #f3f3f3;
    border-top: 5px solid var(--primary-color);
    border-radius: 50%;
    animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes spin {
    0% { transform: translate(-50%, -50%) rotate(0deg); }
    100% { transform: translate(-50%, -50%) rotate(360deg); }
}

#notification-area {
    position: fixed;
    top: 1rem;
    right: 1rem;
    z-index: 1000;
}

.notification {
    background-color: #4CAF50;
    color: white;
    padding: 1rem;
    margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
    opacity: 0;
    transition: opacity 0.3s ease-in-out;
}

.notification.show {
    opacity: 1;
}

.dashboard-section {
    margin-top: 2rem;
}

.dashboard-grid {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(200px, 1fr));
    gap: 1rem;
}

.dashboard-card {
    background-color: var(--card-background);
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    padding: 1rem;
    box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
    text-align: center;
}

.dashboard-card h3 {
    margin-top: 0;
    color: var(--primary-color);
}

.dashboard-card p {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    font-weight: bold;
    margin: 0;
}

.modal {
    display: none;
    position: fixed;
    z-index: 1000;
    left: 0;
    top: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.4);
}

.modal-content {
    background-color: var(--card-background);
    margin: 15% auto;
    padding: 2rem;
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
    width: 80%;
    max-width: 600px;
}

.close {
    color: #aaa;
    float: right;
    font-size: 28px;
    font-weight: bold;
    cursor: pointer;
}

.close:hover,
.close:focus {
    color: #000;
    text-decoration: none;
    cursor: pointer;
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
    .panel-container {
        flex-direction: column;
    }

    .left-panel, .right-panel {
        width: 100%;
    }
}

/* Dark mode styles */
body.dark-mode {
    --background-color: #1a1a1a;
    --text-color: #f4f4f4;
    --card-background: #2c2c2c;
}

body.dark-mode header {
    background: linear-gradient(to right, #1a1a1a, #2c2c2c);
}

body.dark-mode pre {
    background-color: #3a3a3a;
    color: #f4f4f4;
}

body.dark-mode #advanced-options,
body.dark-mode #batch-options {
    background-color: #3a3a3a;
}

body.dark-mode .notification {
    background-color: #2c3e50;
}

/* Improved accessibility */
.visually-hidden {
    position: absolute;
    width: 1px;
    height: 1px;
    margin: -1px;
    padding: 0;
    overflow: hidden;
    clip: rect(0, 0, 0, 0);
    white-space: nowrap;
    border: 0;
}

/* Improved focus styles */
*:focus {
    outline: 2px solid var(--primary-color);
    outline-offset: 2px;
}

/* Improved button styles */
.icon-button {
    background: none;
    border: none;
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    cursor: pointer;
    padding: 0.5rem;
    border-radius: 50%;
    transition: background-color 0.3s ease;
}

.icon-button:hover {
    background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
}

/* Improved form styles */
label {
    display: block;
    margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
    font-weight: bold;
}

/* Improved code block styles */
.code-block {
    background-color: #f4f4f4;
    border-radius: var(--border-radius);
    padding: 1rem;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
    font-family: monospace;
    white-space: pre-wrap;
    word-break: break-all;
}

body.dark-mode .code-block {
    background-color: #2c2c2c;
    color: #f4f4f4;
}
</code_agent_write_file>
